summary: Enhance old, blurred, damaged, scratched photos and videos to HD
recentChanges: Hello Remini Users, It's a great day to try our Enhance feature! We just fixed a little bug that improves the overall performance. Cheers The Remini Team
comments: HELLO! This app is actually good and I never review things so that must mean something. The enhancements it did to some of my pictures was very surprising. My original images would be super grainy and blurry but this app would make it to where I could literally see individual hairs of people's mustaches, eyebrows, and eyelashes, not to mention the great amount of detail that came out of eyes. No idea how the app is able to do this. Seriously just try it out on a grainy picture of someone's face

It's still not working. Everytime I try to enhance a photo, it says "Network Request Timeout (0)" and it wont let me do anything. I tried to reinstall it, but then I could not even sign in to my account because of this error. I hope you guys fix this FAST. I will change my review to 5 stars after the app is fixed because this was the BEST photo enhancer that I am using.. well I "was" using.

I can actually see my great-grandfather instead of a blurry old photo. I wish it could enhance the rest of the photo, not just the face. The color feature needs a lot of improvement. It just turns sections of the picture orange and that's it. Also, I wish there was a no eyelashes option. It keeps giving people thick full eyelashes where there aren't any.

At first I loved using it. But as the days pass by, Everytime I tried to enhance some photos I couldn't because it always says network timeout. Really? I have a stable network connection and then it'll always says network timeout? Please fix this problem so that everyone can enjoy the best quality. Personally I loved it. It's just this thing happen that's why I rate only one star.

At first I enjoyed this app because literally it's amazing!! But suddenly NETWORK ERROR pops out, so I try to update but still doesn't work. I hope you guys fix this issue. But if this issue has been fixed, I can guarantee that this app is worth it!!

comments: Everything was good until I put in my third pic. Now it's wanting all my information to charge me for next week. This is very annoying. I thought this was a free app at first, I wouldn't have loaded if I knew it was gonna charge me even weekly. It gets a 2.

Okay this app isn't all bad! It may be glitchy at multiple times along with several adds, but it works! The age filter is crazy! This app just needs a little... shaping. Otherwise its good! Just want to do a video.

Another scam app that shoves ads all over social media claiming to be free only to do everything it can to make you pay membership fees the very minute you open the damn thing. I refused to hand over payment info as I knew after the 3 day trial (3 days...pathetic) it'd probably prevent me from cancelling until I hand over my first payment. The fact that these apps are allowed on the app store despite such false advertising is a joke. Sick of it.

You upload a pic and then you have to give a review in order to see what the results are or pay $8.99. So here's my review based on everything I've been able to use. You can upload a pic. REVIEW DONE! Let someone see the finished product before they go online and write a review. Since you don't do that my review is the app sucks. The developers obviously don't have any logic, brains or common sense or they would let you use the app before making you review it. You cant fix stupid!

I just signed up for this app. I have a 3 day free trial after which it'd $19.99 per month. 10 minutes after all of this, the app has locked my images requiring me to pay $9.99 for a weekly membership. Before this, I was ordered to rate the app in order to unlock an image. Mind you, all of this occured in TEN MINUTES after signing up for a monthly membership.

title: Adobe Photoshop Express：Photo Editor Collage Maker
description:
PHOTO FUN FOR EVERYONE
Tap into your creativity on the go with Photoshop Express–a fun, fast, and easy picture editor for one-touch transformations and photo edits–used by millions of creative individuals. Make pro-looking images with an easy-to-use digital studio on your mobile device.

Photoshop Express delivers a full spectrum of tools and effects at your fingertips. Personalize your experiences with sticker makers, enhance color gradients and imagery, create pic collages, generate memes, make quick fixes and heighten your share-worthy moments.

PERSPECTIVE CORRECTION 
Instantly fix crooked images and correct distorted camera angles. 

REMOVE NOISE
Smooth graininess, reduce color noise, and sharpen details to make your photos look their best.

APPLY BLUR
Use radial blur to blend out backgrounds and shift focus to specific subjects or full blur to create movement.

PERSONALIZE WITH STYLE
Customize images with the sticker maker, create memes and captions, style your text with a wide array of fonts and layouts, add borders and frames, and stamp creations with custom watermarks.

CHOOSE FROM HUNDREDS OF LOOKS, EFFECTS AND FILTERS FOR PICTURES
Dehaze pictures to remove fog in a scene, apply dramatic filters for pictures, and easily slide to adjust color temperature, vibrance and other color effects.

ASSEMBLE STUNNING PIC COLLAGES
Create professional-quality compilations by adding ready-to-use photo grid layouts and modifying borders and colors.

SPOT HEALING
Easily reduce blemishes and spots from selfies and portraits.

QUICK FIXES
Automatically adjust contrast, exposure and more with one-touch adjustments; easily crop, straighten, rotate for eye-catching layouts, and magically remove red-eye and pet-eye from your favorite moments.

QUALITY PHOTO IMPORT AND SHARING
Upload images from multiple sources and formats (including raw and TIFF), posting your favorites directly to Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Flickr and other social platforms or share them in email, WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger, Telegram, Signal, and Line to inspire others.

Make photo magic happen with the Photoshop Express picture editor from Adobe - proud makers of the Photoshop family. Create fun, shareable memes, personalized pic collages and stickers.  

Adobe Terms of Use:
You must be 13 or older and agree to Adobe’s terms and privacy policy.
http://www.adobe.com/go/terms_linkfree
http://www.adobe.com/go/privacy_policy_linkfree

Do not sell my information: www.adobe.com/go/ca-rights

comments: I've been using this for free for years because it's not worth paying for. The fact that you want $5/month or $35/year for basic features like being able to save your photo at 100% quality is BS!!! I am uninstalling all Adobe products I have on my phone because this company has no idea how to run a business and there's no idea the actual value of their product. FYI you're not worth $35 a year for this app!

Loved this app... Used it literally for years. Best photo editor available. Recently, I had to get a new phone. NOW Adobe wants $35/yr to use the app where you can make changes and save them! It's Photoshop EXPRESS for cryin' out loud! Reputation and respectability for this company/developer in my book have fallen by the wayside. I can't even open pdf files in the acrobat reader. I'll use Pixlr for image editing instead. Very disappointed.

Great for iOS but not for Android. iOS has text styles organized by themes such as memes which is nice, but more importantly, it had the ability to add stroke to text so it stands out against multicolored backgrounds, a huge feature that seems to be missing in the Android version. Would love to see better text theme organization and having text stroke added.

Out of the blue, it is refusing to open. I shall uninstall and reload to see if that sorts it out. Now done. It is opening occasionally, but not from another app (which it used to do without issue). Just like Photoshop itself, what was fine becomes a pain in the neck with an update.

I've used this app for nearly 3 years now and it's always been free. Now I can't use the FREE options anymore, you have to pay for them even though they've been FREE for 3 years. What a great way to rip off customers, taking away what little they already had. Used to love this app and use it almost daily. Now I have no editing app. Seems a lot of people feel this way.

comments: It's a pretty basic filter app, which works fine in it's free version. When first installing and running the app, you need to be careful to hit the X in the top left of the screen, because it immediately tries to sub you to the pro version. Once exiting from that screen, it can take up to 10 mins for the app to load all the effects and filters. This can give you the impression that the app is broken. All D3D effects were broken (Angel Wings you see in ads), constant errors.

It works poorly on Android. Constant crashing, lagging, taking long time to load, crashing while trying to save a picture. Now it doesn't show images when picking images from the gallery, it's all white and gray squares. Filter images don't load either. The worst thing is that no one cares. Very upsetting. I've had a very bad experience with this app, although the filters are great. Fix the android app. Android users deserve good things too.

This was a really good and easy app to use since the middle of 2021, I'm on an android and I find this app really easy to use.. the layout is simple, and so are finding out the controls, but I have been experiencing a lot of lag and crashing. I tried to make a video today and I just randomly shut.. I'm really disappointed and I hope you'll fix this soon!

It would probably be nice if it worked. One of the effects actually loaded but no other effects or filters did anything to photos. Maybe I did something wrong? I waited a long time for effects to show up but nothing. On android. I got a response to try a more recent version updated last week. But I downloaded the app like one hour ago so this is the stable version lol....

This app is ridiculous, 1st of all it only saved *1* photo of me after a year of me trying to edit photo's,2nd of all it takes 5 minutes for *1* filter and efect to load,3d of all you cant see any of the things where you have to adjust per example:i dont see brightnes, contrast and all of the other. 4Th of all i only have filter efects and adjust arent there supposed to be other things per example:trim. Yes i have an android galaxy a2 core but att other people its works please fix it!!!!!!!!!!!

title: Photo Scan App by Photomyne
description:
Photomyne is the fastest and easiest way to turn photographs into live digital records and share them with others. Download to see the magic of powerful scanning action, built with cutting edge AI technology.

This free app offers a taste of what Photomyne has to offer. Use it for basic photo scanning, to see if it suits your needs (before deciding if you wish to upgrade).

SIMPLY HOLD & CAPTURE - SCANNER WILL DO THE REST
* Scan multiple physical photographs in a single shot.
* Scan an entire photo album in minutes.
* The photo scanner auto-detects picture boundaries, auto-rotates sideways pics, crops, restores colors and saves them into a digital album. 

EDIT AND CURATE YOUR COLLECTION OF MEMORIES 
* Add details to albums and photos (locations, dates and names)
* Add audio recording
* Apply color filters & colorize B&W photos

SAVE & SHARE YOUR REDISCOVERED MEMORIES
* Save photos to your mobile device or computer
* Share your scanned photos via a web link
* Create gifts with your scanned photos such as photo collages and slideshows

USE SCANNED PHOTOS TO MAKE SPECIAL EVENTS TRULY UNFORGETTABLE:
* Add a dose of nostalgia to reunions
* Honor memorials with photo memories
* Celebrate anniversaries with old photos
* Add an element of surprise to birthdays

OPTIONAL IN-APP UPGRADE:
For unlimited use, consider purchasing an optional paid plan (in-app purchase). 
Here are the premium features you get with a paid plan:
1. Scan, save & share to the max - Unlimited scanning, sharing and saving to your device or computer in print quality
2. Access anytime, anywhere - Unlimited photo backup, access on other devices and online, and free up space on your device
3. Unlimited enhancements - Enjoy unrestricted photo design effects and creations such as B&W photo colorization and more

The app offers an optional paid plan via monthly/yearly auto-renewing subscriptions**, as well as a One-Time plan which is paid for by a single upfront payment (valid for 2 years). These offer unlimited access to the premium mentioned above.


Got any questions? We’d love to connect: support@photomyne.com
Privacy Policy: https://photomyne.com/privacy-policy
Terms of Use: https://photomyne.com/terms-of-use

comments: Easy to scan although best in certain lights to avoid shadows. The most annoying feature, (I hope someone can correct me) is that I happily added under 'details' what I thought were file names (no other obvious way to name a file) to over 100 photos only to find when saving them that I had over 100 photos named Photo001..etc plus over 100 text files named Photo001.. I shared album and was told they could only copy individual files not multiple.... happy to be corrected on any of these points

I have only used the App a couple times so far but I am really impressed with the picture quality I am getting on scanned pictures so far. I am scanning pictures from 1940s and 1950s that are coming out crisp and clean. The overall picture quality on even some blurred pictures is fantastic. So far so good. I would definitely recommend this App.

Just installed it to see what the prices were but uninstalling now that I see subscription and one time payment is too expensive for this kind of app , not all the time you are scanning old photographs , also it's not a lifetime payment because after 2 years you have to pay again , what da F ? Not worth it guys .

I used it once, so far 5 stars , simple to use, does what it says, if it asks me to rate more than twice every 15 min, I'll post that then I hope I don't have to Uninstaller. I really do like the free version.

Very good - I was using Google scan but this works better and quicker. May have to look into the slide copier once I get though zillions of std photos!!! Of course if you use Google photos then there is still plenty of work getting a realistic date on the photos so it works the Google timeline way of working. But still that's always an issue and this app is really very good.

title: PhotoRoom - Background Eraser & Photo Editor
description:
PhotoRoom is the all-in-one app that edits, designs and optimizes great visual content that helps you run your business from your phone. Remove or erase the background of photos, use templates and create your own content. 

No need to be a photographer or design pro anymore: with PhotoRoom, you can turn your photos into pro-quality content in seconds.
Our magic? The app crops objects and people in your picture, automatically. With one tap, remove the background and create stand-out content that showcases a product or person. Edit the image, add text or a logo, stickers, make collages, or use one of our 1K+ background templates to make it even easier. It's like having a whole photography and design studio in your pocket!


More than 1 million shop owners, resellers, and creators trust us. Join our mobile-first entrepreneur revolution and download PhotoRoom free today.


What you can create:
- Product content for e-commerce & marketplaces like Poshmark, Shopify, eBay, Etsy, Facebook marketplace, or Depop.
- Portrait photography and profile pics for business or social
- Official photos for your Passport, ID or Driver’s License
- Covers for Youtube, Instagram and Facebook
- Instagram Stories to promote you or your business
- Fun collages and stickers

How to use PhotoRoom:
1. Take a picture or upload one from your library
2. Pick from one of our 1000+ available backgrounds or templates
3. Edit the image and add text. Apply filters, remove the background, modify the contrast, or add quotes easily with our smart photo editor.
4. Add your logo (with PhotoRoom PRO)
5. Export your content to your Library, or directly to Whatsapp, Messages, Social Media, or marketplaces like Poshmark, Depop, Vinted, etc. 

PhotoRoom is the Photo Editor for Everyone
- Use the most accurate and easy background eraser to cut out objects in images & erase their backgrounds, apply a white background, blur the background or cut the background itself
- Easily crop photos
- Make your own stickers in a few steps by exporting your pic to Sticker Maker.
- Use our seasonal templates to create easy, dynamic seasonal content
- Make photo collages

PhotoRoom for Resellers
If you are a reseller on marketplaces like Poshmark, Depop, etc, you can optimize your business with features like the AI background remover, product or person cut out, easy export directly to the marketplaces platform, or batch export mode with our PRO membership. 

PhotoRoom for Small Business
Create professional images for your website or app in a few seconds. Use PhotoRoom to remove background, add text, or cut out a product or person perfectly. Edit to your liking and easily export. If you’re looking for Pixelcut, why not try the original PhotoRoom.

PhotoRoom for Creators
Promote you and your business on social by easily creating templates for Youtube or Podcast covers, and Facebook, Instagram, or Pinterest content.

PhotoRoom Pro
In PhotoRoom Pro, you'll have access to the following features.
- Remove the PhotoRoom logo
- Access to 3 Pro cutout options (Standard, Person, Object)
- Access to the full Pro backdrop & template library
- Export at higher resolutions
- Edit and export in batch mode
- Try PhotoRoom Pro with a free trial - limited to one per Google Play account. Once the trial is over, you’ll be charged a subscription fee. Your Pro subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Go to your Google Play account to manage your membership & to turn auto-renew off.

Love PhotoRoom?
Follow us on Instagram @photoroom for illustrations and design tips.
Send your feedback to hello@photoroom.com
With PhotoRoom, you will enjoy the most accurate background eraser. In a few taps, you will add a white background to your pictures, have a perfect pixelcut, or have access to multiple photo editing options.

developer: Artizans of Photo Video Background Editor App
comments: I'm an online seller, so when I found out about this app I thought to myself, "this is going to save me a ton of time". First photo I uploaded was anklet. The app is supposed to remove the background so you can add a nice backdrop. You can't adjust how much of the original background is removed so you see bits of the original background on the new backdrop. It looks super janky. Waste of time. I'd rather do it myself by hand, looks more professional.

Love the app, however it keeps messing up my phone. I have a phone for just taking photo's for my business, so I don't have many apps on my phone. After I downloaded the app my phone started acting up. I had to factory reset my phone and downloaded the app again. It starts off great, but then after several uses it messes my phone up. Needless to say my phone is messing up again. So unfortunately I have to delete the app. I really do love the way my photo's turn out though.

This app would be ideal if it wouldn't cut off one hand or leave a small trash can, if it would've cut out BOTH hands/arms it would have been ok but it only took one of them, and it would NOT release the small trash can, it wasn't attached to the main part of the photo so I'm not sure why it kept doing it.

Trying to erase the background. The line keeps scrolling back and forth over the photo but never erases the background . I have trying stopping and restarting the app. I removed and reinstalled the app didn't help. Also why does parts of the photo show up almost "ghosted". I either fully remove or add the area, depending. Also if trying to remove a small area it's difficult to see. The zoom window is worthless, just gets in the way.

Very helpful app but not perfect. There were times that you surprise me with the result and then 3 out of 5 times I was wondering what the hell why you were not able to remove this and that? So please improve for the better.

title: Photo Lab Picture Editor & Art Face Editing Filter
description:
Photo Lab boasts one of the vastest collections of stylish and funny photo effects: more than 900 effects to date! Fantastic face photo montages, photo frames, animated effects, and photo filters are here for you to enjoy. 

Make your image look creative in seconds without using a professional editor and set it as a contact icon, a wallpaper, send a signed virtual postcard to a friend or share it to any social network.

App’s foremost features include:

☆ Neural Art Styles:
a new smart (and quick) way to turn any photo into an artwork - choose from over 50 pre-set styles.

☆ Photo frames:
choose one of our beautiful frames if you need a final touch to your favorite picture.

☆ Realistic photo effects:
place your image in an unlikely setting. Airbrush it on an exclusive car or leave it as a sand imprint on the beach. You are welcome to get a new wonderful experience!

☆ Face photo montages:
swap face easily and turn yourself or your friend into pirate, an astronaut or a horrible monster. The most complicated montages are handled automatically by a face detection algorithm to create the most unusual selfies.

☆ Photo filters:
you don't need a pro photo editor to add some style to your images with various photo filters such as Black&White, Neon Glow, Oil Painting and many others.

☆ Photo collages:
create a wonderful picture of you and your friend floating together in a sentimental or futuristic setting.

The simple and intuitive app interface helps you quickly learn how to use the picture editor. Almost a dozen of new photo frames and effects is added with each update. We maintain a fruitful dialogue with our users. If you didn't find a particular photo effect in the library, contact the team and you might see it in the next update.

Photo Lab will change your life forever!*
__________
* Photo Lab may or may not change your life but you're totally going to love it!


Please note that Photo Lab is an Internet-based application. It helps us keep your devices' memory free from tons of resources required to create high-quality artworks of your photos.

🎉ps: Photo Lab app is officially announced one of the best apps of 2017 by Google, Russia🎉

comments: This app is the best. There are some suggestions/ideas I would love to see incorporated in this app. Like stickers, you can add on top of your design. Such as flowers or tattoos, earrings, hats, scarves, editing tools. To take out blips in the photo. I currently use 4 different editing programs for one picture. I wish I had the knowledge to create apps. I dont know how or I would have my own.

This is my favorite photo editor i would keep it at 5 stars if it did not delete part of the image I am trying to add. When i add a background it takes the head off the image or takes the seat off making a person look like they are sitting down in the air.

I had this on my apple devices and I love it so much that on my galaxy Note I download it and hot the pro version. Never have any issues with it and everyone loves my edits I do. People actually pay me to do edits for them. Dont change a thing with this app.

It is a very good app, first when I downloaded it, I was installing my favor without knowing what is open but once my heart told me to open it when I open it is very good app You can make your own pic in it like picture you like in it, on this you can also put a song in it by making pics etc. It is a very good app.
This app is super easy to use and has tons of free options!! it does have a lot of ads but they aren't too bad since they're like 5 seconds. I definitely recommend!

title: PicCollage - Create & Celebrate!
description:
Create & Celebrate!  PicCollage helps you make anything to celebrate everything. PicCollage is all about keeping things easy so you can have the most fun creating. Explore FREE card templates, story layouts and photo frames to help you celebrate virtually.  


Our Favorite Perks About PicCollage

Our FREE starter pack in the app is full of new stickers to get you started collaging!
Stories: Templates and to help you get sharing quickly.
Freestyle mode - The blank canvas option to give total freedom to create at your own pace.
Grids: Instant layouts and photo grids to quickly arrange photos from your photo gallery. 
Stickers: Decorate your images and collages by adding trendy and occasion-specific stickers.
Backgrounds: Thousands of exclusive stickers and backgrounds from collaborations with our favorite artists and illustrators around the world.
Cards: Pre-designed templates and frames to quickly create unique messages and greeting cards for any holiday.
Doodle: Draw on your collage to write messages in your own handwriting and style, illustrate something new, or just to circle or add emphasis to a project you’re working on.


 Unleash Your Creativity
Bring your ideas to life! PicCollage brings templates and customization together to give you everything you need to get inspired.  Create quick and easy collages to share during a party, or take your time and make a truly custom design to flex your skills!  PicCollage gives you everything you need to tell your story!

Photo Editor Pro offers everything you want to edit pictures. A host of stylish effects, filters, grids and draw tools help you create an eye-catcher, even if you've never edited a photo before. With Photo Editor Pro, you can directly post your artworks to Instagram, Whatsapp, Facebook etc. Unlock your creativity, and edit pictures like a pro!

Aesthetic Photo Editor
Aesthetic Photo Editor allows you add cool aesthetic glitch effects to your photos. Start your psychedelic journey with glitch effects. If you are a fan of Aesthetic style, you can not skip this Aesthetic photo editor.

Blur Photo Editor
A must-have blur photo editor with advanced blur image brush. It is used to blur parts of your photo to get DSLR blur effect. You can also unblur the image with eraser and adjust its blur strength as well.

Use this advanced background eraser, seamlessly combine your cutout photo with a ton of creative background templates. Both an AI cutout tool and a background changer designed for you to make artworks easily and quickly.

Photo Editor Pro asks for permissions "READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE" to read your photos so that we can edit and save photos. We do not use this permission for any other purpose.

Only downloaded this exceptional app less than a week ago and already it's proven itself to rival (if not surpass) the features on my computer's editor. I think it's found a permanent residence on my phone. Go ahead and download it if you like well-thought-out stuff. 💚

Super easy and fun! I enjoyed this app! It has some pretty cool stuff! It's worth the extra time to check it out and see what you can create. You would be surprised with how many different things you can create! Get creative and make awesome pics for lots of beautiful memories! Pictures are everything. They are what we stay with when someone is no longer here. My advise.. Take lots of pics and enjoy making every single one. You can do so much with this app. You just have to take your time. :)

I use the pro version of this app. This is just mind-blowing. There are some features which make my day. Like: AI Cutout, Backgrounds, Double Exposure, Add photo etc. I have used every single app of Inshot inc And I also have pro version of every single apps. I am a hard one to impress, but you guys made me lose every single time I downloaded any of your apps🤣🤣🤣. You guys are just Amazing. Though I was not able to rate my experience in every single app. I was busy 😅. Keep up the good work😃.

I like this app a lot, it is very helpful to me! The only problem with it is that it clones photos so I have to scroll for a while to find the original to edit. If that can be fixed, I'd really appreciate it.

comments: App starts out perfect! Gives you the ability to make amazing photo cut outs, especially if your smart device comes with a stylus. But sadly the main functionality on what made you probably download the app in the first place! Becomes unavailable! And forces you to sign up for a paid subscription! 😡 That gives you access to the same feature that was previously free! Another app ruined by greed! 😤🤦🏿

Really disappointed how to set you up for auto-pay so I lost $69 or whatever when my free trial is up and I forgot to unsubscribe. And of course the developer waited 48 hours before telling me that you can get a refund within 48 hours of the charges go figure! Disgusting!!
The app starts out amazing, but then to do anything, even to save a picture to your gallery, you have to sign up for a paid subscription. I don't have the spare money just for a random subscription.

It's okay if you want to do it manually but the automatic crop is terrible. I even tried it on a picture (of a single item) with a white background; it removed 90% of the image and left me with a 10pixel diameter circle.

Wow It's great! It does what it says on the tin and allows you to export and save effortlessly right to gallery or wherever without any hassle to buy or deal with advertising. Amazing! 5 Stars guys . I wish more apps was this hassle free seriously.

title: Cut Paste Photos
description:
Change photo background with single click.

Cut or copy people, animals, cars, and backgrounds into other photos and create new photo collages. 

Want to swap faces? Cut one face and paste it onto another. Want to remove photo background? Cut the people out and put them on another background. Want to remove people from photos? Then this is the app for you.

Missed someone in a family photo? Add them into photos without the need professional photo editing tools. This is the best copy paste tool for photos.

Cut Paste Photos comes with 100's of photo editing features. Main photo tools:
1. Cut Photos with AI Background Eraser: Cut photos or extract people or your pets from photo background. Auto Background Eraser removes background instantly and gives you photos you can paste on any background.

2. Copy Photos with Manual Copy: Copy photos using our Manual Photo Cut to cut out exactly the parts you want. Ideal for Face Swap and Face Changer. Swap faces by cutting photo and placing cut face over another face.

3. Advanced Photo Editor: Edit the cut photos for sharper, exact edges. Ideal to remove people or objects from photos.

4. Paste On Photos: Paste the cut photos on any backgrounds from your gallery. Add yourself into famous locations or in photos with famous people.

5. Photo Collages: Create your own collages by pasting cut photos on our custom backgrounds, or create without grids to make freeform collages.

6. Color Pop: Our color splash tool lets you keep rich color saturation while changing the rest to black and white, to highlight the most important part of the photo.

7. Photo Clone: Paste multiple copies of people in photos to create a fun clone effect. Make sure to try Motion Effect along with Clone to try out various clone photo styles. Photo Mirror effects shows mirrored people repeating in photos.

8. Text In Photo: Use our advanced text editor to add text on photos or convert cut photos into text. Text On Photos and Collages include various fonts, textures, and advanced text styles.

9. Double Exposure: Create double exposure effects easily with our tool. Create double exposure with scenic nature photos.

10. Photo Filters: Create awesome Cut Paste Photos effects with photo filters including 100's of photo filters. Cut Paste Photo editor tools include transform features like Flip Photo Vertically and Flip Photo Horizontally.

11. Photo Collage Editor: Cut Paste Photos now includes Photo Collage Editor where you can include cut and pasted photos from various sources and enhance with Text on Pictures and Draw on Photo Collages.


Photo Source: Cut Paste Photo Effect now allows you to use photos from our vast image search and your own device gallery. Image Search lets you search photos from the web to cut and paste in your Photo Collage Editor.Photo Backgrounds now includes image search from the web, our top photo backgrounds that we licensed specially for you, and your own gallery photos.


Photo Stickers: 1000's of Photo Stickers included in the app.

Cut Paste Photos with advanced tools like Advanced Photo Editor, Magnifying Glass, Collage Maker, Auto Background Eraser and more lets you create the best-looking photos and Photo Collages. Changing photo backgrounds is now just one click away.

comments: I'm well versed in many types of editing software on (pc/mobile) and I honestly found the UI too confusing. Nothing seems to happen when I manually cut an image, when I use the smart cut tool on the desired image I am taken to a blank canvas that I can add a background/other edits, but I am never able to actually paste what I cut. I tried about three times and gave up because I have no interest in watching tutorials for what should be a fairly intuitive app. Also there are too many ads.

More ads than you could ever eat! With prices only an advertising executive could pay... Monthly! Maybe this is a show app to prove you can print money. That said this is probably the easiest and most versatile of all available like apps and there are a lot of similar apps. All told in many ways it's like an high functioning alcoholic. Edgy costly fun that may well turn and punch you out.

This app did exactly what I needed. I needed to paste a photo, of just the cropped face, on to another photo. It was super easy to do and didn't take me long to figure it out. There are ads in between each step but that was fine too. I never leave reviews but I thought this deserved it because it completely met my needs!!

This is an amazing app, intuitive, easy to use and smooth. So I understand them wanting to make some money off of it. But the purchase price doesn't make a lick of sense, unless you get paid to make memes. And using the free version is a totally successful exercise in seeing just how intrusive and annoying an app can make its ads. If you're patient, the free app might work for you. I bet the pay app is great but I'll never know because I manage my budget.

BEST APP EVER. It was a little confusing at first... but then when I got the hang of it I managed to edit myself onto a picture of a horse PERFECTLY. Please don't listen to the hate reviews because this app is amazing. Believe me, download it, you will not regret it.

comments: This may well be the dumbest app I've ever seen!!! The developer(s) expect you to pay $$ for a change you can't preview first!! In addition, these changes are not cheap!! Approx $1 for the smallest of changes. Sadly, the app seems to have an incredible amount of detail. However, until they come up with a better payment system this app is totally useless and a waste of time and money. That's my $0.02 worth.

This is a great app, I have spent a decent fee on buying tokens, which in my opinion is well worth it. My only issue is how hard it is to truly gain tokens, where u get a straight up of 5 for following them on IG, but only 1 token afterwards for ads. Can you please change this, I love this app, but I can't afford to continue to spend buckets..

There is no preview so you will know in advance what your changes will look like. So you pay blindly for their service. Why cant you make the adjustments yourself if you are paying on this app? It's very odd. I paid fir a minor change, waited hours and there was no real change. Dont waste your money. God knows what they do with your photo too when they offer you the option to choose between 'confidentiality' or speed of processing time.

Selection doesn't select. Hard to understand what they mean (Please select at least one service in order.) I don't believe there is any service in order! You have to pay for everything. I don't know if it's good or bad. Didn't pay. They want £55.99/month!😂😂😂😂 uninstalling right now.

This app is junk! You pay to have your photos sent back to you and they look worse than they did before you sent them to their supposed designer's! Then you have to pay again to have the photo redone by them. All the good reviews they have must be bogus. Don't waste your time or money!

title: Prisma Photo Editor
description:
*** Google Editor’s choice ***
*** 120+ Million users *** 

Prisma is a photo editor app that creates amazing photo effects transforming your photos into paintings. Using Prisma’s art filters you can make your photo look as if Picasso, Munch, or even Salvador Dali himself painted it for you!

HUNDREDS OF STYLES

You'll find more than 300 art styles in Prisma’s art filter library. Prisma has the largest collection of different artistic styles to choose from.
Find your favorite one!

NEW ART FILTER EVERY DAY

Prisma releases a new art filter every single day. Just open the app and you'll be sure to find a new awesome Daily filter! We also release special styles from time to time. Don’t miss them either :)

CREATORS COMMUNITY

Join Prisma's community, share your creations and get some inspiration. There is a Feed full of the beautiful pictures created by the community. Follow other users, discover new publications, and chat with others.

FINE-TUNE YOUR PICTURES

After applying art filters, enhance the results using image enhancement tools. In the photo enhancement mode, you can find a wide range of photo tools like exposure, sharpness, contrast, brightness, etc.

Terms of Use http://prisma-ai.com/terms
Privacy Policy http://prisma-ai.com/privacy

recentChanges: Various bug fixes and improvements.
comments: Offers a number of artsy filters in the basic version. They can be adjusted for contrast, saturation, etc., and also for transparency. One looks like an 1800s English print; another like an acrylic painting, and many more. There is also a different one-day-only filter each day. (You can only use that filter that day.) I haven't found a convincing watercolor filter among them. For that, buy Impresso.

Paying clients Be aware. You hope the application will work well but that is not the case! Latest upgrade its unstable. After saving the low resolution images application goes back to load the image so you can not do hi resolution images very frustrating. When it works it is great but that is not the case 80% of the time! Be ready to waste some of your time.

I've only had this app for about an hour, but it seems quite interesting. Helpful for sure if you're taking pictures of subjects and not landscapes like I was looking to edit on it. Still though, their basic tools for editing seem better than other editors I have atm.

Barely works. Keep getting messages to retry. Network too busy. And subscribed to premium. Yet, locked out of premium features. Worse yet, sent multiple messages to customer service. No reply. It is a good app. If only they would respond to service issues, and fix the system.

I've used this app for 2.5 years. I use this app more then any app I have ever used in this particular genre. I cringe ever time it gets updated❗It takes several days for the app to be even function again! I wouldn't mind that if I hadn't spent a fair amount of money on this app & the important functions I use daily! There are certain things that you pay for in life that don't need fixing & don't need to be taken away. I would be happy to raise this rating to 5 stars if this changes.

title: Instasize: Photo Editor + Picture Collage Maker
description:
Instasize is the photo editor and pic editing toolkit for creatives. Easily edit photos and pics with premium photo filters, picture borders, collage maker, retouch tools, format photo resizer and so much more.

Share your photos and pics with #Instasize for a chance to be featured.

FREE PHOTO EDITOR
Instantly make your photos look better with our free photo filters. Enhance your image with editing tools including contrast, exposure, saturation, and clarity. Resize the photo to fit any social network like Instagram, TikTok, and Snapchat with our photo crop tool.

PHOTO BORDERS
With over 100+ picture borders to frame a photo or video perfectly into any format. As the creators of borders and frames for Instagram we have everything you need, from the original white border to trending design patterns.

ADD TEXT TO PHOTO
Over 20+ unique fonts to add the perfect message on your photos and videos. Choose any font, color, alignment, and border to put the perfect text on photo.

COLLAGE MAKER
Easily combine multiple photos with our easy to use free photo collage maker. Choose from hundreds of photo layouts, add backgrounds, and text - your creative potential is endless.

PREMIUM
Join Instasize Premium to unlock your creative potential. Access our complete photo filters library with over 130+ filters. From a retro vintage aesthetic to a natural look, get all the filters for photos you need to create. Use precise editing tools including whiten, tan, acne remover, and more to touch up and enhance your images. New premium tools added every month.

SUBSCRIPTION TERMS
Instasize Premium will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Payment will be charged to Google Play Account at confirmation of purchase. You may manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal by going to your Account Settings after purchase.

Terms of use:
http://instasize.com/terms

Privacy Policy:
http://instasize.com/privacy

comments: pretty decent for simple white border, but there is no option to center the image. you pretty much just need to eye it. i don't know, that seems like a no-brainer option to add. you also end up accidentally rotating it by tiny increments and there is no way to auto-reset the rotation.

Its my favorite and only app I use for all my pictures i just wish it was unlimited like why does everything in this world have to be a little bit paid for just give me all the edits I want them and they will be used to the advantage thank you have a nice day and your welcome

I downloaded the app specifically for the Resizing for Instagram feature. It did not resize my image, it merely cropped it to the 4.5 ratio. I need my entire image to fit the 4.5 ratio, not have the top/bottom cut off. This is the difference between "resize" and "crop". Your app name and the features description both indicate full resizing capabilities but, this is apparently not the case. Please respond if I have somehow missed something with your resize feature that isn't just a simple crop.
So far it's been one of my favorites for editing pictures. I like the filters and all of the adjustments I can make to a picture.

Opacity level for text/font. My ONLY reason for rating this so low is because I wanna catch your attention. I've been using this app for 6+ years, and I LOVE IT. In fact, I pay for the membership to have extra features (WHICH IS SO WORTH IT BTWWW) Literally this is my go-to app, I use it for almost everything. The only, and I mean ONLY thing I request is the option to change the opacity of the text/font. This way I can watermark my photos properly! Change this and I'll go back to 5 ⭐ Thank you!

title: PhotoDirector Animate Photo Editor & Collage Maker
description:
PhotoDirector allows you to  animate your photos  with a range of AI-powered effects all in one place. With just a few taps, easily replace the sky, add incredible light effects like bokeh, and  edit photos  for maximum creativity with out of this world effects such as dispersion. Your photo edits just got bigger and bolder than ever.

🌟  The best all-in-one free photo editor and collage maker to enhance, stylize, and animate your images 
Edit your photos all in one easy-to-use photo editor and collage maker. With precision editing tools, you can make essential lighting and color adjustments, crop, and add one-touch looks to transform your photos. Plus, with powerful Photo Animation tools, you can easily bring your images to life. Use Animated Decorations, Sky Replacement, and Object Removal tools and create anything you can think of! Turn heads on social media to create incredible works of art – PhotoDirector is the best free photo editor to let your imagination run wild with hundreds of styles, effects, templates, and tools.

🌟 Incredible Photo Animation Tools
• Animated Decorations – Your editing app should let your photo edits burst with personality. Choose from dozens of animated elements, including animals, seasonal specials, flowers, moods, and more!
• Animated Overlay - Add movement, mood, & emotion to your still images with realistic and fun animated overlays.
• Animated Dispersion - Manipulate particles in your image to create dramatic pictures popping with different shapes and motion.
• Use AI to Create Powerful Edits - Sky Replacement, Style Effects, and Object Removal tools are designed to work perfectly with our Photo Animation tools. Mix, match, and try them all together! Animate any element, alter or change any object, and completely redesign your snap.

📸Creative Editing Tools: 
• Object Removal – Quickly remove any object with a click, and retry until perfect
• Face Shaper - Make subtle, natural changes to your face
• Sky Replacement - Completely change the sky in your snaps
• Change background- Edit any background in your snap by replacing them with new images
• Light Rays- An incredible lighting tool to add light-ray effects to any image
• Easy-to-use White Balance, HDR, and Vignette tools
• Magic Brush – Brush over your image to completely change the style
• Photo Retouch, Selfie Editor, Red-eye Removal tools
• Blur Photo Editor
• Brightness, contrast, warmth, and saturation adjustments

Incredible AI-Powered Tools:
• Sky Replacement – Enhance or completely transform the sky of your images with a single click using stunning templates.
• Cutout - Automatically detect the outline of any object for perfect results, every time.

🎀 Thousands of stickers, filters, frames, and effects!
• NEW content updated monthly!
• Unique seasonal stickers, frames, filters, and effects!
• FREE community content!

💎Unlimited updates, features and content packs with PREMIUM
• Unlock all premium content - effects, filters, stickers, and frames!
• Save images in Ultra HD 4K camera resolution
• Ad-free and distraction-free
• No watermark

✨Powered by Shutterstock
Create captivating photo projects with unlimited access to our premium stock images. 


Premium subscription is billed annually and auto-renews every year, unless canceled 24 hours prior to the renewal date. You may manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal by going to your Account Settings after purchase. In accordance with the store policy, no cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. Once purchased, refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term. 

Find inspiration on Instagram: @photodirector_app
Have a problem? Talk to us: support.cyberlink.com

I am not applying any removal tool application properly..while seeing tutorial also ..in place of removal icon apply place ..it shoes remove letter...while pressing remove word ..it will over lap pre image some part

I have been using Photo Director for many years now and it's the ONLY editor app I need. I have tried so many different editor apps and was disappointed with most of them. Photo Director has just about every filter and option you can think of, including surreal filters and live movement filters. it is a must have app for any photographer and I would highly recommend photodirector before any other photo editing app
Excellent app for setting up images to be animated then moved to Action, or Power Director.

Overall a very wonderful and useful app. I'm still having the problem with the surreal art images. I have the latest version 15.3.1. I can download the same version and be logged into my account on my daughter's phone who has the same version of Android as me and the same version of the app as me and the images will be on her phone. But not on mine. I'll go ahead and make it 5 stars though. I really do love this app

title: Hide Pictures & Videos - Vaulty
description:
We're celebrating 10 years being the app millions trust to protect their privacy!

★ ★ ★ ★ ★  “Vaulty asks for the least in return for the most.” - Naked Security

★ ★ ★ ★ ★  “For people with private videos or private pictures on their phone Vaulty could be a life saver.” - BlueStacks

------------------------
EASY TO USE
------------------------

▌Hide Pictures & Videos Within Vaulty
1. Open Vaulty, then tap the lock icon at the top,
2. Tap an album,
3. Tap thumbnails to select files, then tap the lock at the top to hide them.

▌”Share” Pictures & Videos From Other Apps
1. While viewing a picture or a video, tap the share icon,
2. Select Vaulty from the list of apps,
3. Vaulty will remove the pictures and videos from your gallery and hide them safely in your vault.

------------------------
SECURITY FEATURES
------------------------

▌Image & Video Hiding
Lock up any images and videos, then view them from inside the app's beautiful, fast and powerful gallery.

▌Password Protection
Stay protected. Use a PIN or text password to protect your Vaulty vaults.

▌Free, Automatic, Online Backup
Save your hidden media even if your phone is broken or lost.

▌Multiple Vaults
Keep different vaults to show different people.

▌Mugshot
Snap a pic of anyone who enters the wrong password.

------------------------
MEDIA FEATURES
------------------------

▌Organization
Create new albums. Sort and filter by various attributes. Rename items. Vaulty offers everything a gallery should and then some to keep your pics and vids well sorted.

▌Slideshow
Rotate to fit screen. Random sort. Play GIFs & videos. Vaulty's slideshow allows the ultimate hands-free viewing experience.

▌Full Zoom
Zoom beyond pixel-to-pixel levels to fully enjoy the complete resolution of your pictures (& GIFs).

▌Video Format Support
Vaulty can play any video your device can handle and if there's a format your phone can't handle natively, Vaulty can securely display your video in third-party apps.

OR they get shuffled back into original position they were in and it takes forever to find. Maybe when unlock it could just be at the front of the line so easy to find? I like to lock again quickly after using them again

This app has been amazing. One small request as it is a photo viewing app. Can the photos take up the entire screen as in draw underneath the navigation bar and draw under the cut outs at the top of the device to go fullscreen? See how it works on Google Photos with a Pixel 3 XL with a notch. Thank you!

Good app when you can get past the ads. Have to try and log in 2 or 3 times before i can actually use it. Used to be amazing with the occasional, ad very disappointed with it now. I'll be looking for something else to use..
Nice. But it ask 'please select SD card' everytime I opens this app. Otherwise really great. It's the good app to maintain the secrets, memories etc... We can backup and restore the data.😘
I agree with Dale used to be so good, but now you spend your time trying to get past constant adverts, think it might be time to delete and install something else.

title: PicMonkey Photo + Graphic Design
description:
PicMonkey is a photo editor and design app that helps you make stunning images that attract eyeballs and get results — for social, for your website, for your life. Get more traction with banners, shop icons, and thumbnails. Touch up portraits for profile pics. Engage followers with attractive IG and FB stories and posts. And so much more.

It's all in the palm of your hand! With the PicMonkey app you can:
Easily boost pics with photo editor effects like B&W, Instafilm, LightLeak, and so many more
Create designs by starting with a background, then adding graphic stickers or your own overlays—hello  logos!—and keep transparency
Touch up portraits with makeup editor tools for complexion, contouring, eyes and teeth (in-app purchase)
Add text to photos, and style it right with customizable drop shadows, and letter spacing
Draw, erase, and adjust transparency on everything, including graphic stickers
Boost photo design with our fresh, unique graphic stickers
Crop and resize images for Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Etsy, and Pinterest with pre-made sizes
Retouch photos on the quick with "Presto" automatic adjustments
Keep your photo editor creations in our integrated storage, and continue editing on desktop (in-app purchase)
Share easily to social media — Instagram, Facebook, all your faves


CONTACT US: FOLLOW, LIKE, SHARE
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PicMonkey-363288993696707/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/picmonkey


LEGAL STUFF
Our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy:
https://www.picmonkey.com/legal

recentChanges: How you all doing?  You good?  Getting enough sleep and eating a few 🥦  here and there?  We're trying too.  Nothing much new to report in this release except for a whole bunch of bug fixes.   Cheers!! 🍾🍾🍾
comments: What a HASSLE. Why is there no cloning? Eyeliner? Simple editing available on desktop (to subscribers) but NOT on mobile...in 2021?! And with this new update LITERALLY TODAY, you can no longer undo your last click. I just edited something using the nudge tool, went a click too far, went to undo the last click... NOPE! Can't do that anymore. I had to start over. Unfortunately my membership recently renewed, but this is way past dumb, so consider it my last contribution.

What the heck happened? It was my go to app for on the fly social media post graphics creation for at least a year, within past few days it won't even start up. I've uninstalled and reinstalled, etc but keeps freezing. Before this week I'd have given it a solid 4 stars, but seems so unstable now I'm going to have to delete it and move on.

I have been using this program for a few years now and have raved about it to others, even bought a whole year subscription. Now all of a sudden I can't even open the app on my phone. I get the logo for a few seconds then just a black screen. VERY frustrating. I'll fix my review when you fix the app.

The new app update sucks. I'm already paying £9 a month for a service that is becomimg more glitchy over time... And now I have to pay £13.99 extra on the same account for the privilege of accessing my hub on my phone, a feature that my current susbscription covered up until today?? Make it make sense.

I've been using this app for many many years, but lately all it does is freeze or be incredibly slow. Pics I edit with it are no longer stored in the Pic Monkey folder, but in the camera folder. And I've paid once for access to the full version, now they want more money for new content 👎

title: ToonArt: Cartoon Yourself, Caricature Photo Editor

comments: Not free. SCAM ! Forces you to a paid subscription before you can even see if the app is suitable. Then you have to go through hassle to unsubscribe from paid subscription which in itself is difficult. If an app is meant to be free then it should be free without any conditions on it. if the user then likes the app they can then pay for it. you should have to supply any payment details before you can even try the app. i stand by my original review. cheers

NEED A REFUND. THE APP WHEN OPENED FOR THE FIRST TIME SAID THERE'S A 3 DAY TRIAL AVAILABLE. I CLICKED AND GOT CHARGED WITH ₹1799. I WOULD'VE BEEN FINE WITH IT BUT THIS APP IS SUCH A WASTE. NONE OF THE AVATAR WAS CONSTRUCTED EVEN 1% MATCHING TO THE SAMPLE. IT'S A COMPLETE COMPLETE WASTE. AND SINCE I WAS SHOWN A 3 DAY TRIAL, I'M NOT SATISFIED AND WOULD LIKE A REFUND.

8.99 per month is insane. I wouldn't pay 4.99. it's a nice app and fun and the effects are good. but 8.99 is too much. get it down to 2 or 3 dollars per month and I'll pay it. until then, so sorry but I can't.

I agree with all the reviews below. This app is cute at first but WAY TOO MUCH MONEY just to change a few cute pics and then u get bored with it really quickly. Def should be a free app and you should'nt have to put in your card info just to check it out. SCAM is not worth it

Stated trial but you will be charged. The cartoons are not close to the picture. Very dissapointed. Free trial but auto charge after few days, should have given upfront notice before subscribe. Notice others have highligted the same issue.

comments: I really was expecting better from this app. When I opened it there was no option to skip the subscriptions. Don't install this unless you want to waste your money on a photo editing app.

Not impressed at all. I cancelled the subscription straight away as my son put this on my phone, yet today almost 40 quid has been taken from my account. I'm a single parent and I don't work so this has really hit my finances hard. Please tell me how I can resolve this 😕

Complete package if the things could be added. The feature to add an area to convert into cartoon. Currently only to remove made available. Last but not least, the option to convert full body Egov could require minim size etc so it works properly

Please return the money you charge for subscriptions by offering a fake trial. If you just want money please create a charity app. Don't just put in generic reply begging for five star rating. You seriously don't deserve it.

The amount of free features is astounding. I love all the options. There are ads about every two minutes, but you can skip them after 5 seconds. And there's a watermark on your finished cartoon, but what do you expect for free?

title: Unscripted - Posing Guide for Photographers
description:
+Stuck in a rut? Struggling to attract your dream clients and stand out from the crowd?

+Join thousands of photographers using the Unscripted Posing App and start capturing raw emotion and authentic moments today! 

+Confidently turn your photography hobby into a dream business! Download the Unscripted Posing App now


*****
GAME CHANGER Download this app stat, this is a must have app for every photographer who wants to capture real moments. Stop reading reviews and just go download it and see for yourself - App Store Review*****

*****
“This app is a LIFESAVER! I swear it’s changed my photography game for good, a must have app for photographers!” - App Store Review

We know you want to be a confident photographer and turn your passion into a dream business. But photography can be a fairly lonely business, and without affordable resources to help empower you, it’s easy to feel insecure - from directing your clients on how to pose to asking for payment. 

That’s why we created Unscripted. The all in one app that empowers you with the resources you need to curate and run sessions that you and your clients love. It’s your app to stay organised, get paid and provide a professional experience for your clients.

Join a community of over 400,000 registered users who have discovered their confidence as photographers. Unscripted has been voted a MUST-HAVE app for photographers by SLR Lounge, Photo Bug, Looks Like Film, and collaborates with brand ambassadors from all over the globe. Check out our raving reviews to see how this app has helped thousands of photographers worldwide!

You too can find your confidence and become a thriving photographer in just 4 steps: 

1. Download the app - you’re already here!
2. Confidently curate your first photoshoot
3. Build your professional business using the client management system
4. Turn your photography passion into a dream business

And get: 

1. A 7-day risk-free trial

2. Photoshoot inspiration with over 7,000 prompts and poses

3. An ever-growing library of educational resources including: 

-Editable client guides
-Authentic posing guides and videos
-Guides on understanding your camera
-Light and composition mini courses
-Business and marketing tips
-Editing and workflow videos

4. Partner discounts from brands and photographers you love (from presets to camera gear!)

5. A sun tracker to help you plan your shoots for the best golden light

6. A quick-access camera settings guide, for those moments you totally blank during a session

7. A full client management system, which includes:

-Client calendar noting completed, upcoming and unconfirmed shoots 
-Client questionnaires for every kind of photoshoot
-Lawyer drafted contracts that can be signed digitally
-Digital invoices and online payment integration
-Email templates for every step of the client experience
-Automated emails and payment reminders
-Checklists for months, weeks and days before the shoot
-Wedding day photoshoot timeline 
-Saved poses and prompts for each shoot
-Photoshoot history and status tab

So Download Now and begin your 7 day free trial to discover how Unscripted can help you direct photoshoots with ease and manage clients professionally. It’s time to find your confidence as you turn your passion into your dream business!

“GET THIS NOW - WHAT THE ACTUAL HECK! This app is what everyone who ever feels stuck needs! Or even if you don’t and just want a crap ton of ideas so you don’t feel like you’re doing the same thing over and over! Ummm this could easily be worth a few hundred dollars if it were a course. EASY. TAKE IT. NOW!” - App Store Review

Read the terms and conditions here: https://www.unscriptedposingapp.com/terms 
Read the privacy policy here: https://www.unscriptedposingapp.com/privacy-policy

comments: I absolutely love this app. From the thousands of prompts and poses to the technical support and everything in between. I was teetering on the fence on whether or not I was going to start trying to make a business from my passion of taking photos. Then my cousin sent me a link to their advertisement. Reading through everything offered I kept thinking "This sounds too good to be true." Contract templates, poses and prompts, golden hour and blue hour by location, questionnaires and so much more.

I am loving this app! Has everything I need in one place. It does seem to load slow, but for those of you old enough remember the Heinz ketchup commercial, whose slogan was "It's slow good", will know it is worth the wait!!! And the customer service is AWESOME.

H-E-L-P I can't log into my subscription. The concept of the app has great potential for Photographers that why I will like to get it working. But most app seem to fail when it's time to pay for them. (Update31/07/21) App keeps crashing. (Update01/08/21) Everything up and running much thanks.

I LOVE this app!!! As a photographer, I can do so much within this single app! I can learn about camera settings, lighting, and customer service, or message clients with Unscripted templates I've adapted to match my business, or get inspiration for poses! 12/10 suggest! 📸🥰

This made my job as a photographer so much easier! The posing suggestions number in the hundreds and it's an all-in-one resource for invoicing, contracts, scheduling and client questionnaires. Can't imagine my photoshoots without it!

title: Preview - Plan your Instagram
description:
EVERYTHING Instagram you need in ONE app.

Free UNLIMITED Posts, Reels, Insta Stories, rearrange posts, edit, auto-post, best Instagram hashtags, caption ideas, analytics, repost, and more.

What are you waiting for?

Used by +9 million Instagrammers, content creators and business owners.

Preview is the ultimate Instagram feed planner app.

Plan your:
• Photos
• Videos
• Carousels
• Insta Stories
• Reels
• IGTVs

What’s inside:

• NO INSTAGRAM login required

• Drag and Drop

• UNLIMITED Grid Space (for free)

• Analytics and Insights

• Amazing filters

• Editing Tools

• REPOST photos, videos, albums, Reels, IGTVs

• Image Splitter

• Set video covers

• Schedule & Auto-post

• Caption Finder

• Hashtag Finder

• Hashtag Analytics

• Team Features and Permissions

• DESKTOP version

• Multi Device

• Backup

• Fonts, Symbols, Characters & Kaomojis

Instagram like a PRO.
Preview is your visual planner for Instagram. Predict what your feed will look like before you post anything on Instagram. It has all the features you need in one app. No more switching between multiple apps.

UNLIMITED GRID SPACE (for free)
Add as many photos and videos as you want in your Preview. Your creativity doesn’t have a limit!

REARRANGE POSTS
Use the drag & drop to arrange your Instagram posts. Design your own unique theme. Color coordinate. Predict how your feed will look like. Or simply plan your content in advance.

INSTA STORY PLANNER
Plan your Insta Stories and organize them perfectly with swipe up links.

REELS + IGTV PLANNER
Plan your Reels and IGTV videos. Change the covers to see if it fits your grid.

ANALYTICS & INSIGHTS
Track your performance. See your Top Posts, best times to post, followers growth, clicks to your link in bio, best hashtags, and more.

AMAZING FILTERS
Design your own unique and amazing feed that reflects your personality or brand. Preview comes with beautiful filter packs and unique filters.
Find filters similar to vsco. Or choose a theme pack.

REPOST
Curate and share other Instagrammers’ posts.

PERFECT YOUR CAPTIONS
Write your captions in advance and perfect them. Save your hashtag groups within the app and add them to new posts at a press of a button.

CAPTION IDEAS
Personal and business captions for the entire year. Including caption prompts, quotes, puns and questions to ask your followers to boost your engagement and get more comments - naturally.

FIND THE BEST HASHTAGS
Hashtag research done for you. Search for the best Instagram hashtags to grow your account. Search by category, country, city and Instagram community.

SCHEDULE & AUTO-POST
Plan your feed in advance and schedule it so you don't have to think about it. Preview has been officially approved by Instagram to auto-post for you.

AMAZING EDITING TOOLS
All the basics are in Preview: contrast, saturation, exposure, etc...
And your favorites too: free whitening tool, blemish remover, meme maker & much more.

MANAGE UNLIMITED ACCOUNTS
Manage as many Instagram accounts as you want and easily switch between them.

PLAN YOUR FEED WITH YOUR TEAM
Give access to your Preview feed to your team by sharing (or not sharing) your Instagram password. One plan = unlimited team members.

NO INSTAGRAM LOGIN/ACCOUNT REQUIRED
You don’t need an Instagram account to use Preview.


Have fun creating!

The Preview Team
@preview.app

REPOST
Curate and share other Instagrammers’ posts.

PERFECT YOUR CAPTIONS
Write your captions in advance and perfect them. Save your hashtag groups within the app and add them to new posts at a press of a button.

CAPTION IDEAS
Personal and business captions for the entire year. Including caption prompts, quotes, puns and questions to ask your followers to boost your engagement and get more comments - naturally.

FIND THE BEST HASHTAGS
Hashtag research done for you. Search for the best Instagram hashtags to grow your account. Search by category, country, city and Instagram community.

SCHEDULE & AUTO-POST
Plan your feed in advance and schedule it so you don't have to think about it. Preview has been officially approved by Instagram to auto-post for you.

AMAZING EDITING TOOLS
All the basics are in Preview: contrast, saturation, exposure, etc...
And your favorites too: free whitening tool, blemish remover, meme maker & much more.

MANAGE UNLIMITED ACCOUNTS
Manage as many Instagram accounts as you want and easily switch between them.

PLAN YOUR FEED WITH YOUR TEAM
Give access to your Preview feed to your team by sharing (or not sharing) your Instagram password. One plan = unlimited team members.

NO INSTAGRAM LOGIN/ACCOUNT REQUIRED
You don’t need an Instagram account to use Preview.


Have fun creating!

The Preview Team
@preview.app
summary: ALL-IN-ONE Instagram tool: Presets, themes, plan, analytics, schedule & repost.

POBox 1045
The University of Queensland
Gatton
QLD 4343
Australia
recentChanges:
New features & performance improvements for your Preview app.

• Image Splitter tool
• Auto-post
• Plan Instagram Stories
• Plan Reels + IGTV with covers
• First comment auto-post
• Reply to comments
• Tag location
• Tag people
comments: Well, since I didn't hear back after emailing I guess I will post up here! It doesn't work with auto-post unless you have a business account, and when we changed it it still didn't work! Also wanted to plan a multi-panel post on the feed and it is error-city left right and centre! Doesn't work well for much except reminding you when your post should be posted...which my phone's alarm feature can do just as well. Emailed to ask for a full refund as we bought the premium, but no reply.

I have no complaints, works well for planning out insta posts. Anything that's lacking is available in the paid version but the free version works really well for what I'm after. It notified you when you've scheduled a post and it's easy to share the post to Instagram.
I made a payment of 14.99$ for one month of subscription you guys took my money but I never received the subscription. I made the payment using your app.
Claims to schedule reels but all it does is send a reminder to you to publish them. It also tries to add a bunch of it's own hashtags. Not worth downloading.
Preview makes life easy. I'm using it for my business and im very happy with how it helps me plan my posts to keep my profile clean and professional. thank you guys

title: Skylight
description:
The Skylight app allows you to manage your Skylight devices.

If you have a Skylight Frame, you can send photos and videos to your Frame from anywhere! Simply log in and connect to your frame to start sending photos in seconds.

If you have a Skylight Calendar, you can review, add, and remove items from your Grocery List.

Features include:
- Video. Send and play videos on your Skylight Frame.
- Text captions. Add text captions to photos.
- Download. View and download all the photos from your Skylight onto your phone.
- Manage frames. Easily manage all your Skylight Frames in one app.
- Cloud backup. All your photos backed up forever.

- Download. View and download all the photos from your Skylight onto your phone.
- Manage frames. Easily manage all your Skylight Frames in one app.
- Cloud backup. All your photos backed up forever.
summary: Manage your Skylight Frame and Skylight Calendar on the go!

101A Clay St, #144
San Francisco, CA

recentChanges: New feature: remote settings
comments: Pretty easy to use but the subscription pop ups are so aggressive that it genuinely makes it more difficult to navigate the app. If I could redo it, I'd buy a product that is more expensive upfront but doesn't have a pay wall for every tiny thing (see photos that have already been uploaded, make albums, etc). Note - that means that if you accidentally upload the wrong photo, you may not be able to retrieve it 🙃 buyer beware

I got the frame for my parents last Christmas so I could send them pictures of their grandbaby, and they love it! I love how easy it is to send photos -- there are a few different ways to send them. Also, huge bonus that I was able to quickly and easily set it up for them remotely, as they are verrrrrrry bad at tech. Also love that my sister can send photos of her family too. This is one of the best gifts I've ever given them. Such a great gift if you're far away from your family.

I was excited to get the frame. Setting up was difficult because I didn't understand why the calendar was already full, was it an example? Then other peoples photos showed up after I paid for subscription. How do they come off? Now the app has charged me twice. Frustrated 😒

Terrible app. Loads correctly about 20% of the time on a brand new Samsung s21. Awful notification control. The picture frame is OK, with only fair resolution. A good idea with meh execution. Oh, and the website they tell you to use to activate it gives you a 404 error.

Love this photo frame! My aunt bought this for my grandparents recently and it was the best gift idea ever. My grandmother absolutely loves seeing pictures of all her grandbabies and gets so excited and calls when she see a new upload. Best idea ever. I'll be purchasing another for my Dad very soon! :)

title: Artisan: Cartoon Photo Editor & Art Photo Filters
description:
Artisan sarjakuva kuvan muokkaus on paras karikatyyriohjelma sarjakuvaan ja digitaalisen taiteen tekemiseen monilla taiteellisilla valokuvasuodattimilla. Käsityöläisten sarjakuvien valmistaja esittelee monia vektoritaitesuodattimia ja karikatyyriefektejä kuvien sarjakuvaamiseksi ja avatarifioimiseksi yhdellä napautuksella. Tee anime-taidetta muuntamalla kuvat maalauksiksi ja sarjakuviksi nyt! Artisan-sarjakuva-kuvankäsittelyohjelma on all-in-one-kuvankäsittelyohjelma, joka tarjoaa henkeäsalpaavia selfie-kameratehosteita kuvien muokkaamiseen, avatarifiointiin ja taiteeseen erilaisilla digitaalisen taiteen suodattimilla. Valmista kuvitus Instagramille, Facebookille, Whatsappille ja Flickrille. Jaa sitten Tumblr, Snapchat, TikTok, VK ja Pinterest saadaksesi paljon tykkäyksiä!

🎨  Sarjakuva Kuvan Muokkaus: 
Jos sinulla on Artisan-sarjakuvasovellus, et tarvitse muita kuvankäsittelysovelluksia valokuviesi muuntamiseksi sarjakuviksi. Valitse upea kuva kuvagalleriastasi muokattavaksi ja sarjakuvaksi. Tutki öljymaalaussuodattimia ja upeita valokuvatehosteita saadaksesi upean profiilikuvan. Piirrä itseäsi avatar-suodattimilla nähdäksesi itsesi suosikki animaatiohahmosi. Saatavilla on paljon upeita valokuvasuodattimia ja -tehosteita, kuten väri-, luonnos- ja öljymaalaussuodatin kuvien retusointiin. Muuta valokuva sarjakuvaksi  tai mangaksi muutamassa sekunnissa taiteellisen avatar-suodatinsovelluksen ansiosta. Viimeistele kuvankäsittely legendaarisilla memoji-tarroilla, neon-spiraaleilla ja söpöllä tekstillä. Montaasi kuvia kollaasikoneella käyttämällä kauniita valokuvakehyksiä ja tarroja syntymäpäiville, pääsiäiselle ja Halloweenille!

✨  Taiteelliset öljymaalaussuodattimet ja pop-artefektit: 
Artisan-taidetoimittaja on hieno vapauttamaan sisäinen taiteilijasi ja muuttamaan kuvasi taiteellisiksi maalauksiksi käyttämällä taide- ja luonnosefektejä. Sarjakuva-suodattimien lisäksi rakastat lyijykynäsuodatin.

🤳  Selfie-kameran tehosteet: 
Artisan-sarjakuva-sovellus tarjoaa hämmästyttäviä selfie-kameran suodattimia ja tehosteita sarjakuvaan itsellesi ilmaiseksi! Ota itsesi taidekameralla ja piirrä itsesi nyt! Artisan-kuvankäsittelyohjelma on johtava digitaalisen taiteen sovellus- ja avatar-valmistaja, jolla on kasvojen live-kameran suodattimia ja tehosteita.

💥  Mahtavat sarjakuvataustat: 
Artisan-kuvankäsittelyohjelma poistaa täydellisesti taustan, joten voit valita loistavan taustan ja käyttää tippumisvaikutusta! Paljon värikkäitä kuvioita ja väriroiskeita käytettävissä manga-taiteen tekemiseen.

💖  Esteettinen tiputusvaikutus: 
Uskomattomat tippuvat vaikutukset yhdistettynä sarjakuviin. Photoshop-vaikutus vain muutamassa sekunnissa sarjakuvan tekijän ansiosta. Joko hämärtää taustaa tai vaihda se upealla anime-taustakuvalla! Sarjakuvasuodattimiin yhdistettävissä on monia tippuvia vaikutuksia.

😍  Profiilikuvan luoja: 
Piirrä itsesi luomaan upeita avatar-profiilikuvia Artisan-avatar-luojan ja emoji-valmistajan kanssa. Voit lisätä lyijykynän luonnosefektin ja supertaustat tuomaan vielä hauskempaa karikatyyreihisi. Käytä eeppiseen kuvankäsittelyyn sarjakuva muotokuvaeditoria ja hauskaa sarjakuvan valmistajaa. Anime-kuvankäsittelyohjelmassa on kaikkien aikojen paras AI-sarjakuvasuodatin.

Artisan sarjakuva editori on kaikki yhdessä sarjakuva-sovelluksessa, jossa voit animoida kuvia, avatarifioida itsesi sarjakuva-kasvosuodattimilla ja kauniilla piirustussuodattimilla kuville. Liity uuteen memoji-trendiin ja muokkaa valokuvia ammattilaisena Artisanin kanssa saadaksesi vaikutuksen ystäviisi! Valmista henkeäsalpaavia animoituja kuvia Instagramille, Facebookille, Whatsappille ja Flickrille. Jaa sitten Tumblr, Snapchat, Tik Tok, VK ja Pinterest saadaksesi niin paljon tykkäyksiä.
