comments: This app is PERFECT for stop motion in any instance with any object. The only bad reviews I've seen for this app are about the green screen issue but I dont even use the green screen. The editing us amazing and easy to use and this app is 100% worth your money.

It wasn't that different from the free one, but the abilitys make it a little better, but I don't know what the merge tool is for. I am saying this because I thought it could merge 2 different frames together and make 2 of the same prop.
Look no further for a great stop motion experience. Everything is great, it could use a few more sound effects, but what it doesn't have you can download from a website. I highly recommend this app.

The setting is a bit hidden but you can manually set the shutter time, the brightness correction and the focus. This is essential to get a good and consistent style. It also saves those settings for the next time

Is a great app for beginners but it needs some work with the green screen feature it does not always work and most of the time if it's the wrong shade of green it doesn't work or from lighting is off.

title: Polarr
description:
Polarr is the easiest app to create your own aesthetics and share with others. 

• Easily customize your own style with selective colors, overlays.
• Generate QR and short codes to share styles with others. 
• Segment your photo with A.I. to easily make complex edits.
• Upload your own overlays to push the boundaries of your styles.

Included effects:
• Selective objects: Sky, Person, Background, Vegetation, Building, Ground, Animal, etc
• Selective masks: Brush, Radial, Gradient, Color, Luminance.
• Overlays: Gradient, Duotone, Weather, Texture, Backdrops, Custom Overlay, etc.
• Retouch: Skin, Liquify, Face shapes (mouth, teeth, nose, chin, etc).
• Global adjustments: Light, Color, HSL, Toning, Effects, Fringing, Details, Curves, Vignette, Grain, LUT

Styles:
• Import style as QR or short code.
• Create style with all included effects.
• 100 free style backups with Polarr account.
• 120 preset styles for film emulations.
• Batch import styles.

Productivity:
• Batch photo exports.
• Face detection.
• A.I. object segmentation.
• Polarr account backups and sync filters across all devices.

comments: It's been more than a month and I STILL cannot download any of the pictures. When I try to, the app just shuts down and it just gives me a plain black image. I've tried everything, restarting the phone, updating the system, re-downloading the polarr app multiple times the past month and yet, nothing. I've had to screenshot the image and crop it myself if I wanted to save something, and I'm starting to get sick of it because that doesn't produce the best quality pictures. PLS FIX IT IM BEGGING U

Was good til they updated. You used to be able to use a ton of features for free. Now it updated and you have to pay for everything. The only thing you can do is mess with exposure and the contrast. Kinda sucks since it was my go to app for editing photos but now I guess I'll just find another.

I really love this app.It has so many features and easy to make filters if you know how to explore,i highly recommend this to anyone but the only problem is whenever i want to make a new account it says that 'this' google account has already polarr acc even tho i just made it,same to when i change the email of my polarr acc it says the 'password isn't valid',i can't understand why.If this is a bug please fix this immediately,when this is fixed i'll give an 5 stars.

I think there is an ongoing bug in my Polarr app. I was about to import a polarr style that has some selections in the background and replacing it with a picture. When I was trying to apply it to my pic, the background picture didn't show up unlike the filter itself. I do hope you will fix this!! Tysm

Let me just say, one of the best apps I've ever used. But it does have its lesser features. This app is not available on chromebooks, and older phones, which I had for a few years. It glitches a fair amount.

title: Pic Collage Maker, Photo Editor - FotoCollage
description:
FotoCollage Photo Editor is a powerful and easy-to-use photo collage maker and photo editing app. Just select some images you love, you can easily put them in a perfect layout, add numerous styles of background, text, sticker and frame to make your pics art, creating unique and awesome collages of your own.

FotoCollage will be your favorite Photo Editor.

Key Features:
● Combine photos with amazing layouts into beautiful collages
● Remix up to 20 of photos to create wonderful layouts and collages
● Change the photo layout, turn your photos into rounded corners
● Photo editing tools, change the sharpness and shadow adjustment
● Make many kinds background to your photos, such as blur background
● 37 unique photo effects for making unique photo collage
● Stickers, tags, emojis, texts, tens of  photo borders and frames
● Rotate, mirror, flip images, drag or swap them, pinch to zoom in or out
● Emojis and tags make your photo more stylish
● Turn your pics into art with perfect filters, effects and photo editing tools

⭐ 100+ layouts
There are 100+ popular design templates in fascinating pic collage tool. By these templates you can mix up to 20 images, flexibly create collaged photos and make a shape collage, such as heart and diamond. Show your style with your attractive collages!

⭐Text
You will enjoy features of font sizes, color, gradient, outline, shadow, space, background edition in a free manner. Insert words anywhere in the collage in a bid to record your wonderful mood, share experience, and make the collaged photos look high-ranking.

⭐Emoji Stickers
Enjoy 500+ funny stickers which can lending a festive touch to your photos , and they are updated in line with the latest fashion. Besides, there are a variety of amazing Makeup stickers, such as neon, muscle, wing, hair and so on. Try emoji or selfie makeup stickers on your collage, and you will love it.

⭐ Background & Pattern
You can choose variety kinds of cute pattern as background, such as love, dot, xoxo, texture and so on, you can adjust their opacity, space, size and angle. 
Subvert the traditional dull and boring styles, these lively background make your photos look high-end. You can also add solid color & blur & gradient color background which can make your collage elegant.

⭐Filter with Advanced Looks
Photo Filter can revolutionize your photos with one tap. Lots of great filter effects can make people, pets, foods in your pics looks perfect. Besides, you can adjust the details of brightness, contrast, warmth by yourself. Hope you will love them.

⭐ Graffiti Brush
Enjoy FotoCollage with cool customizable brushes. Doodle on pictures by a good many of brush types and get surprise effect, including enriched colors and adjustable strokes, such as pattern, solid lines, dotted lines, fluorescent brushes, decorative brushes.

By FotoCollage photo editor, make your own perfect photo collage with a wide variety of layouts/stickers/frames/backgrounds, Become the focus of attention among friends in TikTok, WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook etc. Try it and have a wonderful time with FotoCollage!

Enjoy making amazing photo collages and edit your photos with the best FotoCollage!
If you have any suggestion, feel free to contact us: photocollage.feedback@gmail.com.

recentChanges: A lot of new filters!!!!
comments: This app is worthless. It won't recognize or use any of the existing photos on my phone or in my Google Photos. Also I was told that I would receive a notification before being charged. I did not. I want my money back,but haven't been able to find an option even to cancel. I'm not some idiot boomer either; I buy, cancel, and use apps on my phone all the time.

A subscription service for something like this is kinda silly. I would gladly buy y'all a venti coffee for this app... But not a coffee a month. Otherwise it's a beautiful app that does a beautiful job.

Very nice app is not accurate. There are no words in the human lexicon to discribe what this app means to a stroke victim who can use it to create once again. I am slowly regaining my abilities, but this app allows me to have hope for the future. This app has given me the ability to paint once more... how can you put into words anything that has given you back your very soul!

It was very fun when it worked, but today, on the day where my free trial would be ending, the app force closes any time I try to select a picture. I hope they continue to work on this, but I can't justify a $20 dollar sub on an app that won't work for my anymore.

This is a great app for sharing with friends and family. It yields both beautiful and funny results, depending on how you position your selfie and how well lit you are. Does an amazing job at what it does, but the recent addition of ads can get in the way sometimes.

title: Z Camera - Photo Editor, Beauty Selfie, Collage
description:
♛ Best App on Google Play in 75+ countries

Z Camera is a fully featured selfie camera with real-time aging, photo editor, stylish stickers, advanced filters and special collages. Just download Z Camera and take your best selfie with 100,000,000+ worldwide users!

Why so many users like Z Camera?
❤ Real-time aging effects
❤ Magical effects with different styles
❤ Tons of latest stickers & AR stickers
❤ One tap to beautify your selfie
❤ Trendy live selfie filters when photographing
❤ Funny face swap features
❤ Fashionable hair style editor
❤ Kinds of special collage templates
❤ Styles of super sexy makeup effects
❤ Muscle building & 3D tattoo effects
❤ Body & face shape selfie editor
❤ Stylish eye makeup stickers
❤ Themed with super star, doggy face, etc.
❤ Easily share in our Z Moments community
❤ Private Z Gallery & Encryption function
❤ Tap! Snap! Capture your moments in 1s

Let’s capture more special moments in Z Camera!

——★——★—MAIN FEATURES—★——★——

【Real-time Aging】
-With our camera, you can see what you look like when you get aged.

【Beauty Selfie】
- Just one touch can beautify your unique selfie
- Adjust your face & eye shape in real time
- Magical live effects including AR stickers & filters
- Funny face swap to combine different styles
- Intelligently smooth and brighten your skin
- Super sexy makeup collection including lipstick, blush, eyebrow, eyelash, eye shadow, eye line & double eyelid

【Stickers & AR Stickers】
- Free 500+ stickers for beauty selfie & photo editor
- Motion AR stickers when photographing
- Themed with super star, doggy face, vampire, etc.
- Easily resized and moved by using multi-touch
- Attractive body stickers including hair style, muscle, cosmetic lenses, eye shadow, lipstick, beard, tattoo, etc.
        
【Photo Editor】
- Change your and face shape instantly
- Easily adjust skin tone, hair color, lip style & eyes
- Crop, Rotate, Flip, Straighten
- Adjust Brightness, Contrast & Saturation
- Adjust Vignette, Sharpen, Temperature & Tone
- Doodle and text adding
- Magical mirror-image effect
- Tilt-Shift to control perfect lens blur

【Live Filters】
- A various range of filter effects to transform your photo into an artwork, such as Texture, Sketch, Leak, etc.
- Offer mad & cool dynamic filter effects
- Available when photographing or photo editing
- Preview filter effect before taking pictures

【Collage Template & PIP】
- 200+ free collage templates & PIPs to combine your pictures
- Provide globally popular ‘picture in picture’ mode
- Easy to edit & combine by swiping
- Offer any scenario for your new selfie experience, such as billboard, screen, magazine, photo frame, crystal ball, etc.

【Z Gallery】
- Private Gallery to sort & classify your photos better
- Encryption function to keep your private photo safe

——★——★——Z Camera VIP——★——★——
Part of the  effects and ad-free experience are only offered for Z Camera VIP. 
Subscription content will be updated regularly and you can enjoy the updating content during an active period of subscription. It is an auto-renewing subscription after your 3-day free trial. If you choose to purchase Z Camera VIP, payment will be charged to your Google Play account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the Play Store after purchase. The current subscription price starts at $9.99/month, $59.88/year. Prices are in U.S. dollars, may vary in countries other than the U.S. and are subject to change without notice. If you don’t choose to purchase Z Camera VIP, you can simply continue using it for free.

Instagram:  www.instagram.com/zcamera/

However, there must have been a new update or something because now everytime I try to make a collage, I can't access any of my photos on my camera roll. And I have given this app permission to access my gallery. Like I said, this used to be a good app. Too bad it had to change like this. I mean, I'll keep the app because it's still good to edit singular pictures but can't use it to make collages anymore sadly.

I recorded about a dozen videos with this app on my Android phone, and after recording when I wanted to check the videos, the android player says unsupported file format for all videos except for one. I have tried to copy them on to my PC, my PC media player can't play them and also I tried to covert them into some other playable format, the media player converter failed to do so! What the hell is this! Please some body tell how to play or covert those videos!
This has become one of my favorite editing apps. I share my edits to instagram and everyone is blown away by how good thry are. Great and functional app indeed.
I have been using this app since 2019 and my phone got damage when I try to restore my photo it won't allow me and those pic are very important to me.

I used to love this camera, worked excellent with my other editing only apps. It was free with the new stuff costing and wait awhile and it'd be free. Then 💣BLAM💣, no email, no notification. Nada Just took the cash outta Google pay (got rid of that also) too bad but even if they'd told me, look around, they're just as good for free. I just realized that I'd recommend my best friends to this. Lovely 🤢 NOT WORTH IT, get photo lab

title: Logo Maker - Logo Creator, Generator & Designer
description:
Want to create your own LOGO?
This Logo Creator app is useful for making Business Logo, advertising Logo, social media marketing Logo.

Logo Maker app really important to building your business’ brand reputation. When you’re ready to create a logo for your business, this app gonna help you a lot to create your very own original and impressive logo.

Logo Maker is also useful to create promotional posters, advertisement, offer announcements, cover photos, brochure, news letter & other branding material for your shop, restaurant, office or social sites.

Logo Maker includes a huge collection of categorized Art(Stickers), Graphic Elements, Shapes, Backgrounds & Textures to create an original logo in no time.

Logo Maker is fast and easy to use app with tons of Arts, Textures, Background & Colors. Logo Designer App comes with all professional photo editing tools to create a professional LOGO. All you need beside is an Idea to build your very own logo.

Logo Maker also provides professional photo editing and text editing tools like: Font, Flip, Rotate, Resize, Color, Hue and lots more that you'll need to create beautiful original logos.

Key Features:
1. Your logo can be customized with text
1. Backgrounds & stickers OR add your own
2. Fonts OR add your own option
3. Crop images in various shapes
4. Text Arts
5. Multiple Layers
6. Undo/Redo
7. Save On SD Card
8. SHARE on Social Media

Download Logo Maker App NOW and instantly discover cool logo design ideas.

comments: This app was very easy to use and was able to combine various elements made available even in the free version to create something unique. If you enjoyed the experience and download your free creation; all they ask for is to tell your friends, give a nice review. Acknowledging them anywhere you use your design is a nice way to give thanks!

This is EXACTLY WHAT YOU NEED if you are a beginner like me. Use preloaded templates or upload your own image. It was AMAZING how easy it was to complete a logo. I'm currently on my second one and have plans to do more.

It was so simple to use and I love the finished product however the draw section wasn't any use. Loads of choice, styles variety and colour I get the images are premade but you can definitely make them your own
App is very easy to use and so engrossing like an art project. It's so enjoyable to use that you don't feel like working. Yet, this is a powerful tool for its functionality.

It's a very nice app I love the fact about it. Very easy to use and good for editing I love the fact about the app and that's why I'm rating a very good 5 🌟 for you guys and hope to continue making a nice like this..

title: Cartoon Photo Editor: Cartoon Yourself, Selfie Art

With this great cartoon photo editor, now you can cartoonize yourself using your front camera or turn a photo to cartoon from your photo gallery to make impressive pictures :) Using various art filter, painting filter and plethora of painting effect, you can create an artistic pic and share it to your social media, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter and Pinterest to impress your girlfriend, boyfriend, family or friends :)

comments: Pathetic.. in every step, there's an advertisement you have to endure for a good 10-20 seconds! The application is more about making money through ads by making it's users forcibly wait through them to use the application! Not happy at all. Uninstalled it in 2 days. 👎

This app doesn't contain any of a free art styles or fliters. You have to pay first then only you are accessible to some of the art filters. Worst app . If you do have pay the bill the you can download otherwise don't ,I uninstalled it. And lots of ads.
Bought it. Don't know how to use it though. Wanted to create the cartoon effects but kept getting stuck at the photo page with only a few art styles.

Horrible, so many ads. You will go from screen to screen with avoidable ads. How can you really test an app with so many ads. In my opinion is the worst app on the store. The photos are useless. If we had the option for zero star, this app deserves zero stars. These app win the most annoying app in the store.
Same concept as much of the photo art apps . And to $$ for what you get .. becouse I have other apps that are cheaper and have the same logic ..

title: Plann: Preview for Instagram
description:
Love Instagram? Then you’ll love Plann: Preview for Instagram app. Get Insta planner, schedule posts, use Instagram picture editor and crop, get content prompts, create breathtaking stories templates with Canva stories, gain Insta followers & so much more! When is the best time to post, you ask? Plann app will do the thinking for you; our scheduler lets you know when to post on Instagram. 

Plann app features: 

✔️AUTO POST TO INSTAGRAM
• Plann: Preview for Instagram app can post images and videos automatically to your Instagram grid.

✔️FREE PICTURE EDITOR
• Plann app allows you to create professional looking photos.
• Retouch, brighten or whiten your Instagram photos with free Instagram picture editor. 
• Resize & crop images.
• Add borders, text to photos & draw on photos.
• Choose from hundreds of looks from Vintage to Pastel, or add special effects.

✔️SEAMLESS DRAG & DROP
• Create immaculate Instagram themes.
• Get best grid for Instagram.
• Instagram preview of your entire photo gallery posting.
• Add months of content.

✔️INSTAGRAM POST SCHEDULER & INSTAGRAM STORY
• Draft captions, schedule IG posts & stories.
• Plann Instagram manager helps you decide when to post on Instagram & gain even more Insta followers. 
• Compatible with Google Drive & Dropbox.

✔️INSTAGRAM ANALYTICS & STATS
• Gain valuable Instagram insights into best times to post.
• Review Instagram Analytics for best performing posts, Instagram likes, follower growth & locations.
• Insta tracker of most popular posts & color swatches.
• Optimize - proven to grow your followers, raise engagement rates & generate sales.

✔️MULTIPLE INSTAGRAM ACCOUNTS
• Preview & manage unlimited Instagram accounts.
• Invite others to manage your Instagram.

✔️UNIQUE PLANN INSTAGRAM STRATEGY
• Don’t know what to post? Create a strategic Instagram theme.
• Plann: Preview for Instagram app has fonts for pictures to add unique marketing calls-to-action to images.

✔️COMMENTS & MENTIONS
• Speak with your community & manage your comments through Plann: Preview for Instagram.
• Find & respond to every mention.

🌟 Your favorite app just got even better with these new features:
✔️CONTENT PROMPTS 
When you’re not sure what to post, Plann app gives you ideas for 50+ industries. 

✔️ARTISTIC TEXT OVERLAY TOOL
The perfect tool to add your own text overlay is now available with Plann app. 

✔️STOCK LIBRARIES
Video & images ready for commercial use are available with Plann app. For free! Enjoy some of the most popular brands out there: Pexels, Unsplash & Pixabay.

🌟 PLUS: 
Offline mode
Monthly & weekly calendar views
Toggle between drafts & scheduled posts


Manage & schedule your Instagram posts over multiple accounts with Plann app. If it seems like we are looking at Plann through rose-colored glasses, well, that’s because we are & so will you once you download & use Plann app.

USE PLANN FOR FREE
Login with Facebook to Plann your Business Instagram Account OR
Log in with your email
FREE PLANN
Manage 1 account (30 posts a month)
Need to grow your business faster?
POWER USER - Manage 1 account
$12 month-to-month OR $9 per month (billed annually).
BUILD - Manage 2 accounts within a team of 2 people
$25 month-to-month OR $19 per month (billed annually).
GROW – Manage 5 accounts within a team of 4 people
$75 month-to-month.
PLAY BIG - Manage 10 accounts within a team of 8 people
$165 month-to-month.

Payments will be charged to your Play Store account after confirmation of purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew unless canceled at least 24-hours before the end of the current period.
Your subscription can be managed in your Play Store Account Settings after purchase, or in Settings under “Subscription”. Subscriptions cannot be canceled for the current active period.
Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable

comments: Too many bugs and glitches!!! Photos from your feed just dissapear, doesn't show reels on your grid. There are better apps that do far better for free.
With Plann, I was able to delete several other apps I was using to create and plan for IG. It has great editing tools, many more than IG, and a business supportive scheduler.
The best app by far to schedule your posts. I love it and I have tried several apps. I stay with this one.
I just love it. It's a one-stop shop for all my social media: planning, scheduling and/ organizing.

This app is a lifesaver for a mom working from home who has her resources stretched to the max. Efficient and small, it takes so much pressure off having to post something daily, and my account is growing since I started scheduling because I never miss a post! Simply love it!

title: Simple Gallery Pro: Video & Photo Manager & Editor
description:
Simple Gallery Pro brings you all the photo viewing and editing features you have been missing on your Android in one stylish easy-to-use app. Browse, manage, crop and edit photos or videos faster than ever, recover accidentally deleted files or create hidden galleries for your most precious images and videos. And with advanced file-support and full customization, finally, your gallery works just the way you want.

ADVANCED PHOTO EDITOR
Turn photo editing into child's play with Simple Gallery Pro's improved file organizer and photo album. Intuitive gestures make it super easy to edit your images on the fly. Crop, flip, rotate and resize pictures or apply stylish filters to make them pop in an instant.

ALL THE FILES YOU NEED
Simple Gallery Pro supports a huge variety of different file types including JPEG, PNG, MP4, MKV, RAW, SVG, GIF, Panoramic photos, videos and many more, so you enjoy full flexibility in your choice of format. Ever wonder "Can I use this format on my Android"? Now the answer is yes.

MAKE IT YOURS
Simple Gallery Pro's highly customizable design allows you make the photo app look, feel and work just the way you want it to. From the UI to the function buttons on the bottom toolbar, Simple Gallery Pro gives you the creative freedom you need in a gallery app.

RECOVER DELETED PHOTOS & VIDEOS
Never worry about accidentally deleting that one precious photo or video you just can't replace. Simple Gallery Pro allows you to quickly recover any deleted photo and videos, meaning on top of being the best media gallery for Android, Simple Gallery Pro doubles as an amazing photo vault app.

PROTECT YOUR PRIVATE PHOTOS, VIDEOS & FILES
Rest assured your photo album is safe. With Simple Gallery Pro's superior security features you can use a pin, pattern or your device’s fingerprint scanner to limit who can view or edit selected photos and videos or access important files. You can even protect the app itself or place locks on specific functions of the file organizer.

Check out the full suite of Simple Tools here: https://www.simplemobiletools.com

Simple Gallery Pro's Website: https://www.simplemobiletools.com/gallery

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/simplemobiletools

Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/SimpleMobileTools

Don't forget that if you uninstall our photo album within 2 hours, you will automatically be refunded. If you want a refund anytime later, just contact us at hello@simplemobiletools.com and you will get it. That makes it easy to try it out :)

comments: I thought this app was great--until I tried to resize a photo. It should be a simple process, but it has been a real headache. First of all, why make us type in the number of pixels? Why can't we just enter a percent (i.e. if you want to make the photo 50% smaller or 200% bigger)? I had to resize one photo over and over because it would not save (despite the app saying it did). Now I'm soured on this glitchy app. PLEASE FIX THIS GLITCH! Then I may give you a better rating.

My current phone only has Google Photos as the default app, and I hate it. I love Simple Gallery so much. My photos are so well organized now, and getting them that way as so fast and hassle free. I also love that it has a recycling bin folder that is created whenever you delete pictures (after you empty it, the folder goes away until you delete something else). I was able to rescue a photo that I selected in a large batch of deletions on accident.

Have been using the free version of this app for a few weeks on my new Motorola 5G phone. Worked pretty well once I figured it out. But since the last update it has gotten rid of many of the features I was using. Tried updating to Pro but still not doing what it use to. Now can't edit most of my photos or simply rename them. If not fixed will be looking for another app

I did leave a 3 star review yesterday but now I can't find it. I'm updating to 5 star as the issue I had I've now resolved. When I tried to share edited photos, it would only show the unedited originals (even though I deleted those after editing). However I've since found when you actually attach them, it then updates and shows the edited photo. All in all this app is great, very similar to the old Album app which a lot of Sony users will have been used to but the editing on this is far superior

Great app. Been using it quite awhile now and an very happy. I do wish there was a feature to make downsized copies of selected images before sending so that I can compress more images into an outgoing email. If it does include this function, I just haven't found it.

title: Painnt - Pro Art Filters
description:
Painnt turns your photos into masterpieces, for real! Use the most advanced AI tech to dramatically improve your art with tons of fully customizable HD filters.

Turn your photos into artwork that look like real (and beautiful!) paintings, with varied beautiful color palettes and sharp brush strokes. 

Choose from our selection of 1000+ filters, including classical, comic book, modern, abstract and mosaics. We regularly add new stunning filters to our collection.

Preview and fine-tune settings for unique results, and render realistic paintings in high resolution. When you are ready to unveil your masterpiece to the world, save or share your painting with friends and family by email or social networks. Also, join our awesome community where you can display your artwork, get feedback and engage other like-minded artists.

This free app limits output resolution, show ads and adds a watermark; you can unlock the entire library, hide watermarks and ads and enable high resolution via an in-app subscription.

comments: This app has a lot of potential, example; it has a lot of choices within it. My opinion, and this is where my frustration has taken up residency: this app has one of the worst abilities to recognize faces, clear and very pronounced faces. It puts up a propt that says that no face was detected. You can only crop out so much of the picture before it takes away from the final product. Please work on this

I really love this app! It is by far the best filter app you will find. Pictures turn out very nice!! Only thing is it lags and I have to restart it again but that's usually after I've edited 3 or 4 pictures! But the quality so makes it worth it;

DEVELOPERS: please work on the upper right section, and overlapping lines for 4k output sizes!! No matter what, the background color is quite different from the other 3, and is almost never a usable image as is. It's fine with detailed images, but 50% of the pieces I work with cannot be done at 4k because of this. Very disappointing for a paid membership. Aside from this problem, I absolutely love this app! You can upload your own effects, and the effects available with the membership are vast

After using an App that allowed me use tools by hand (user freindly) No choice to erase or highlight areas with desired options was a huge let down! This was exciting to find and couldn't hardly wait... However not having user friendly desktop tools to control how filter used was a big deal for me. Not sure if that explains well? On this app could only adjust by a sliding scale of options: not get to control the page by tools at my desk with what options were provided . Great app

Incredible program. Father of cubism in a box... Really stunning effects/filters with an accompanying array of fine tuning controls to perfect your art piece. Masterpiece, I should say. Many thanks to the Painnt app team; you should all be very proud of your creation. Turning snapshots into fine art, indeed! Well done!

title: Lens Distortions®
description:
A layer-based photo editor for creating cinematic imagery.

Lens Distortions® is a brand known for taking iconic visual techniques from the advertising and film industries and making them available to creators in post-production. The Lens Distortions photo app delivers this same promise for mobile image creators.

Harness the power of beautiful light, natural elements, and elegant overlays to create truly vivid images. With our layer-based approach to color and effects, you can fine-tune the details of every element and turn your photos into immersive key art compositions.

Take complete control of your image with LD Unlimited, our premium offering of Color Layers, the Erase/Mask tool, and more than 400 photo effects including the full suite of Light Volume effects. Color Layers offer limitless customizations like masks, gradients, and blank adjustment layers.

“The best effects are the ones no one knows you added.”

Lens Distortions® effects are hiding in plain sight in the work of today’s most influential creators. Discover what makes LD the best-kept secret among pros and get access to the exact tools they use to create world-class imagery.

• Light Volume™ - custom light rays with dynamic light sources and atmospheric textures.

• Light Hits™ - the most beautiful and easy-to-use lens flare available.

LD UNLIMITED MEMBER FEATURES

• Adjustment Layers - create custom gradients, masks, and tone adjustments

• Erase/Mask tool - paint out part of an effect with the swipe of a finger

title: Merge Videos - Video Cutter - Rotate Video
description:
- Video Merger Free is a simple app to merge and join video files into one file. it support different video formats with different frame rate,same frame size and same audio rate. It supports adding unlimited video files and join them or merge into one file.
- Smart Video Rotate and Flip provides and simple way to do multi rotations and flips at the same time using four icons below the video preview. It can rotate videos using fast mode or by re-encoding the video file.

Features:

- Fast rotation is supported.
- Clean and easy to use tool.
- Free for any one to use.
- Uses the powerful multimedia library FFmpeg.
- Smart and simple user interface.

Merge Videos, Video Joiner is use to merge your favorite videos into a single video. You can also add your favorite music in video .This app also allows you to select your favorite part from video without cropping and with cropping options.

► Easily merge different resolution videos into a single video

► You can also add your favorite music in video.
► You can also mix videos like first as a crop, second as a stretch, other with aspect fit.

You can select the movie, that you want to rotate, from gallery or camera. This app is a video 90 degrees, 180 degrees, 270 degrees rotation editor tool.
Rotate video FX will not only correct wrong tag, but also rotate all frames. The rotation works on desktop screen as well.

If I was a professional photographer that might be okay, but I'm not. I'm just a person that wants my photos to look decent, an old man living on a fixed income. If there was a way to opt out of this new plan that too would be okay. But I didn't see that option

Scumbag developers suddenly added a paywall to basic functions like loading a precut image taking what was a mediocre but functional app and turned it in to GARBAGE, don't bother installing, can't load cut images meaning you have to recut things for no reason clogging up your phone with multiples, you didn't even add a single thing just tacked on 1.99 a WEEK which you already dropped to .99, I'd throw you 2 bucks ONCE but you can literally blow me for a weekly sub

Can't pull up Cut Photos. Running a note 9 and since update when you are editing a picture and click on the add cut photo button nothing happens. When you cut photos the app will not save the cut picture. I have a cut photo file in my gallery but the app no longer let's you access the file in the gallery.
Awesome. I use this a lot and it always works with my gacha characters. You are my number one choice when cutting and pasting things together! Thank you for creating this app! It's my fav to use.

4 star very great though free,enjoyable too it helps me make my youtube thumnails i use 2 app i use PISAPP not picsart and i use this one it helps me a lot but i gave it four is because.. you cant add a text like iknow the meaning of it but why not i would be very happy if the delevolper adds this into the app thank you

title: ViewBug - Photography Community & Photo Sharing
description:
This app is for photography lovers!

Join the photography community, photo editor and photo-sharing app that fosters collaboration and rewards creativity!

Just getting started with photography? Already an experienced photographer? Participate in photography competitions and challenges, get instant creative feedback from other photographers and improve your art! 
With the ViewBug photography app, you can also make your pics look great thanks to the powerful tools in our picture editor. 

20 EXCITING PHOTO CONTESTS EACH MONTH 🏆📅

Showcase your art with 20 new photography contests every month, judged by world-renowned professional photographers, and sponsored by top brands. With the ViewBug photo app, submit your photos to photography contests across many inspiring categories and get discovered and awarded.

WIN AMAZING PRIZES 🥇📷

Photo competitions are fun, but they are even better when you can win big!

Compete with other members of the ViewBug photo community and win amazing prizes. Here are some of the cameras and prizes won for recent photography competitions: Canon 5D MK III and Nikon D5300 cameras, DJI Spark drone, Leica Camera, Samsung 4K Smart TV, DJI Osmo, etc. Feedback, tips, and prizes… Now, THIS is photo sharing with a purpose, and you won't find something like that in other photography apps such as 500px, Eyeem and Gurushots!

By sharing your best photos you can be featured, get published, and win the gear that will make you stand out and help you take your photography art to the next level.

FREE PHOTO EDITING TOOLS 🛠️ 📷

Photography editing to make your best photos “pop” even more is easy. Use our powerful photo editor and photo enhancer:

+ Advanced photo presets
+ Exclusive photo filters that you’ll find only in our picture editor
+ Basic picture editing tools like Brightness, Contrast, and Saturation
+ Exposure, Tint or Clarity to fine-tune when editing photos

With the free photo editing features, you can get creative with photo filters and photo effects...And show your art in its best light. Try our photo editor and compare it to VSCO CAM and Enlight!

GROW YOUR CRAFT WITH PHOTO CHALLENGES
Each peer photo challenge is created by a fellow photographer with a creative spark. Join a challenge, dive in and share photos to display your creativity! Not only do you get feedback from your peers after sharing photos, but you can also get recognition and rewards as well.

FIND AMAZING PHOTOGRAPHY INSPIRATION
Browse more than 25 million submitted photos for some on-the-go inspiration and discover some of the best photos around the world. 

Follow photographers and get personalized recommendations to become a better photographer yourself. Get social and like or comment on their photography art, discover new photo styles and vote to award your favorite shots!

GET INSIGHTFUL PHOTO TIPS AND TUTORIALS
Discover photo techniques and photography tips from peers and thought leaders in the community so you can improve as a photographer. Whether you want to edit photos like a pro, take better portraits or master lighting techniques, get social and learn from the best on ViewBug. 

TIME TO IMPROVE YOUR PHOTOGRAPHY SKILLS
You probably already have the pics you need on your phone to get started: upload some of your travel photos, a still life photo or one you took of a photo model. Or find a photo spot and take a new photograph!

We are photography enthusiasts and are in love with this visual art form. Our mission is simple: We want to offer the best tools to empower photographers worldwide. The ViewBug photography community even has a marketplace allowing you to license and sell photos.

Privacy Policy: https://www.viewbug.com/privacy-policy
Terms of use: https://www.viewbug.com/terms
Support: https://help.viewbug.com

Tell us what you think: feedback@viewbug.com

recentChanges: Thank you for using ViewBug! This update includes improvements in speed and a few minor fixes.
comments: Cool experience other than the fact if you're not a professional, have the best equipment, or steal pictures from Google you won't win. I've been using Viewbug for about 5 years and it's impossible to win. How is my work (shot on a Canon T3i) supposed to compete those using Sony A7C, Canon 5D Mark IV, etc? Of course I stand a 0% chance.
App is basic. After uploading, can't edit taggings. ViewBug photo uploading does not support keeping original resolution.

The app lives up to the name. At least the "bug" part... I like the app and the concept, but it constantly shuts down when attempting to upload photos. There is also a VERY unusual bug which makes my camera flash go off when uploading a photo. I'm using a Xioami Note 10 with Android 11 MIUI 12. I want to love this app, but at this point it is unusable.

Wow, there is quite a time passed since users, including me, complain that sign in with google isn't working, and developers did nothing about it. What a shame! I think Google should consider some changes to app rates, cause this app (after such broken updates) shouldn't have nowhere near 4 stars rating.

I had to buy a subscription twice for it to recognize it and when I try and submit photos to "pro" contests, it kicks me off and logs me out. When I try to go back and log back in, it's just a white screen. Please fix this!! I'm on a Samsung Galaxy S20+ 5G

title: Colorize - Color to Old Photos
description:
Brought to you by the developer that built the smartest photo scanner app, Photomyne is proud to now also offer an AI-powered B&W colorization app that will blow you away. It’s one of the most accurate old photo colorization apps - the results will amaze you.

IT’S AUTOMATIC - JUST ADD B&W PHOTOS:
1. Scan a B&W photo or upload one from your camera roll
2. Just a single tap automatically adds color to your monochromatic photo
3. All done - browse the gallery of your colorized photos
4. Save or share your photo memories, now in full color!

Turn monochromatic old photos into vibrant photo memories full of life and color in just seconds with accurate AI photo colorization.

OPTIONAL IN-APP UPGRADE:
The first few photos are free. For unlimited use, consider purchasing an optional paid plan (in-app purchase). 
Here are the premium features you get with a paid plan:
* Unlimited B&W colorization
* Unlimited photo saving and sharing

The app offers an optional paid plan via monthly/yearly auto-renewing subscriptions**, as well as a One-Time plan which is paid for by a single upfront payment (valid for 2 years). These offer unlimited access to the premium mentioned above.

Got any questions? We’d love to connect: support@photomyne.com
Privacy Policy: https://photomyne.com/privacy-policy
Terms of Use: https://photomyne.com/terms-of-use

8 HaKishon St.
Bnei Brak

recentChanges: This release includes a major change to premium features. A subscription now includes cloud storage and account access on multiple devices. In addition, subscribers can also access their photos from a PC.
comments: @$9/ month you would expect exceptional results. Tried it... pretty useless... did a better job with free online colouring websites that use the same algorithm. In fact I'm pretty sure all these b&w to colour apps use the same algorithm engine, just repackaged with a different user interface and billing.

Some pictures are colorized excellently. I couldn't hope for better. Some pictures parts of people are not colorized at all, wish I can see that happening too. If a picture is faded because it is turning gray because of fixer, when the color is straightened out then the subtle colors are stripped completely away. I'm sure this is necessary to get a clean photo. Overall I think it's a great app.

I would recommend using this app. Especially for those who are heavily colorizing B/W photos as a part of their business (photographer), but for me, I'm not a heavy user, but still the subscription cost is too high to increase the allowed free photos from 8 or 10 just to 15 or 16 for instance (suggest you increase the number of free photos to colorize per day - Many thanks in advance

It does a great job colorizing black & white photos. HOWEVER, there's 2 major issues which make this app highly frustrating! #1 is the automatic cropping feature. It crops far too much off of the original photo! The 2nd point which is also highly irritating is I have to pre-edit my photos, only then will your app recognize it as being in the recent category and ready to be colorized. Any other time it'll refuse to colorize my photo choices. Uninstalling!

There's a lot of frustrations with this app. Namely it is laborious to process more than a few images and you have to import, scan, save etc. The ingesting of multiple images should be easier. When you do use the file sort by option this only lasts for the current selection and then reverts to date. The colours are off 50pc of the time and colors as washed out pastel...the past wasn't as wan as the images make then out to be. The auto cropping is a nightmare. Get rid of it it chops too much

title: NYMF: Sensual Art Photos by David Dubnitskiy
description:
Welcome to the world of art and beauty.
NYMF is an original application by David Dubnitskiy, which is a collection of hundreds of unique photoworks. On NYMF, you can save high-quality photos to your smartphone, view backstage and photoshoot materials, learn more about professional photography, edit photos with a built-in photo editor, browse certain works in 360º-format and a lot more!

NYMF provides access to hundreds of original photoworks. David is committed to creating new and unique photos, the number of which is growing week after week. Set a reminder on your smartphone in order not to miss the opportunity to be one of the first to get acquainted with David’s new art.

Soak yourself in the atmosphere of genre photography with the help of virtual reality technology. View 360º photos in the app. All women's beauty and grace are now in front of  your eyes. You can get away from dailiness, abstract from routine and spend time in the company of a beautiful girl and melodic music.

Edit your photos with the help of the built-in editor. Enjoy David Dubnitskiy’s unique filters that are unavailable anywhere else, and flexible tools for photo processing. Use editing options to make color correction, apply gradient, add grains, enable blurring for particular parts of the photo and a lot more!

The app provides access to extra materials from David’s photoshoots. You can view the whole process of making a professional photo. Take a step closer to photographer’s art and browse backstage videos. Besides, follow new articles, tips and photography lessons.

360º photo is a unique opportunity to experience the atmosphere of photography and plunge into it; you can take a live look at the photo and remove all obstacles, feel the emotions that the photographer wanted to convey.

Use NYMF mobile app to access exclusive photo works that you will not find on the Internet.

“I want to show you genuine female beauty. For me, photography is not just a way of capturing life moments, it is an opportunity to reveal a woman's soul, to show it without filters – just the way it is”, says David Dubnitskiy.

Take your chance to subscribe and be one of the first to access premium photos.

• Payments are charged to user’s Google account after confirmation of purchase.
• Subscription automatically renew unless the user cancels it at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
• The account is charged for the renewal within 24 hours before the end of the current period.
• Users can manage and cancel subscription in their account settings on the Google Play.

recentChanges:
Friends, meet the updated version of NYMF and enjoy:
– Improved "Inspiration" section. Pick up categories, learn more about photography and watch unique tutorials.
– We have prepared an improved photo editor and gallery.
– A new ability to share impressions about any publications.
– A lot of fresh photos, videos and materials are waiting for you!
– Thanks to CDN technology you will receive content with a perfect quality immediately.
Enjoy NYMF!
comments: Concept is terrific but android app on samsung tab a will not play photo 360. Video's will also not play in full screen mode, just get a black screen with control buttons - the advance forward and back function but play does nothing. Would recommend higher resolution for photo download. Hope you can get it all straightened out, Beautiful images !

Beautiful images but frustrating app! It should be possible to view images in full screen mode and simply swipe to the next photo - it takes too many clicks to go back out into the gallery, select the next photo and get it full screen. I paid for premium version and still it's the same experience and I don't enjoy using the app.

The pictures could be show with or without filters. I can aplly my own filter. So, it would be more polite if we could choose (filters or not). Besides it, its a beautiful art this app! Its what we need today: be creative with this subject (natural body). And, off course, the women become more fantastic as they really are! Congratulations!
Excellent examples of composition and lighting. Would like to see more on video and pairing technical aspects with storytelling.

Awesome app. I'm putting 3 stars because I cannot select language. I speak Russian natively and I'd love have the app in Russian. But my phone is in English, so the app is in English too and there is no way to put it in Russian. Watching David's videos with terrible British voice-over is annoying.

Awesome app to get followers, you hace to work hardcore to get them but thats a solid point. Overall its awesome sometimes ir las but no that ver y orden great app to get a few followers/likes.

title: PicsApp Photo Editor: Photo Collage, Photo Filters

Unleash your creativity with the neon spirals and cute angel wings. Finalize your photo editing with the pic collage maker, using amazing photo grids and picture layouts. Share your artwork on Instagram, Facebook, Whatsapp, Snapchat, Tik Tok, VK, Tumblr, Flickr, Twitter and Pinterest to get so much like :) .
 
🎨Aesthetic Photo Editor Free: 
PicsApp picture editor will be your new best friend for photo editing :) . Have awesome pics for Instagram in one tap using the glitch effect and golden hour filter. Breath taking filters for pictures, and camera effects are waiting for you. You’ll love the sketch effect, have a hand drawn pic in one tap. To personalize picture editing we bring you camera effects like glitch effect, cute stickers and stylish text. PicsApp photo editor invites you to the magical world of picture editing with the colorful spirals :) . Loads of spirals available for you in different styles and colors. In addition to classic spirals, angel wings, butterfly wings and geometric shaped spirals are waiting for you to explore. There are plethora of neon spirals and emoji backgrounds available to make your pics art experience fabulous.

🐶Stickers and Text:
PicsApp photo editor comes up with a comprehensive sticker library including funny animal stickers. You can find cute stickers and emojis for special days like Birthdays, Christmas, Halloween and Valentine’s day :) . Stickers make your pics attractive. Add stylish text to your pics to express yourself better :) .

🎉Background Changer:
Remove background instantly to change it with your stunning background image :) . So you can pretend to be in neon streets or on a holiday thanks to the background changer. Either blur background or completely remove it with one click :) .

🤳Selfie Camera:
Snap selfie using PicsApp camera filters and effects to have smooth skin and perfect light. You’ll always look stunning with PicsApp sweet selfie camera effects. Live face camera effects let you see the photo filters directly on your face :) .

😍Pic Collage Maker:
Montage pics in one special post or make hilarious memes with the photo collage maker :). PicsApp offers great photo grids, staggering frames and picture layouts. Picture grids give you marvellous ideas for photo collage. Also making memes with collage maker is so easy.

PicsApp offers you the best photo editing experience with the neon spirals and dripping effect. Once you have PicsApp photo editor you don’t need any other editing apps for pictures. Edit picture for free then share your artwork on Instagram, Facebook, Whatsapp, Snapchat, TikTok, VK, Tumblr, Flickr, Twitter and Pinterest to get many likes :)

title: Love Collage Maker - Photo Editor & Heart Frames
description:
Turn your favorite photos into a beautiful collage!

Love Collage is a photo collage app that will turn your pictures into a masterpiece. All that you need is fantasy. Create your own unique picture collage, decorate it with photo frames, try original effects and share it with your beloved or friends. Add a special caption to photo - it will show them your care and will make them smile.

Our photo collage maker has an inspiring and usable interface that will help you to reveal your creativity. With our various filters and frames, the creation of love photos will be easy and exciting. Just open the app and start: edit layout, add text to photos, make a pic collage, select filters, add stickers, use photo effects - enjoy! Don’t forget to write a few warm words or place some text on photo, express your feelings!

For example, you miss your beloved and want him or her to know about that. Browse your photos, place them in a colorful frame and add love quotes. You can even create a gift card for your mother not only on Mother’s day using our beautiful collage maker.

You can send your love pictures via messengers or social networks instantly! Moreover, you can print your photo montage and get a real gift card for a special case. 

Fancy photo collage editor will give positive emotions to you and your dearest. Become a collage maker, edit pictures and share your love images!

You haven't been a guru in photography? Develop your photo edit skills - creating your future masterpiece because our pictures editor is extremely easy to use and offers a lot of features to stitch your pics and make them look awesome!

Wanna surprise your sweetheart at St. Valentine's day? Our new collection of Valentine's Day romantic frames, stickers and emoticons is perfect for lovers, for couples, and for all people who cherish their feelings. Edit pics with love!

Create a love card with various love quotes like «I love you», etc. It will be a nice surprise for your beloved! It's so easy to do – just choose a photo frame you like as a base for your love card, choose a font and color, then add love quotes and, finally, send this amazing love card to your beloved via SMS, E-mail, Messengers or share via social networks.

Main features of the app:
- Tons of photo frames 
- Photocollage frames 
- Photo grids 
- Photo effects (sepia, 70's, 80's filters & more) 
- Stickers, emoticons & clipart 
- Text on the photo
- Photo frames and editing photo features: mirror, crop, rotate, brightness/contrast/sharpness adjustments & more
- Easy sharing via E-mail, SMS, Instagram, Facebook, WhatsApp & more
- Special frames for Valentine's day, Christmas, New Year, etc.
- Enjoy free app or subscribe to ads-free version

Love Collage is a fantastic photo editing software and collage maker for pictures that you would like to post online or share with friends. Let your fantasy unwind!

title: Deep Art Effects - AI Photo Filter & Art Filter
description:
The ultimate art editor filter app for high quality photo filter lovers, that transforms photos and selfies into famous fine art paintings with the help of AI. Use free art filters and art effects. Choose from more than 100+ art styles and find your favourite photo art effect.


NEW! Create your own art styles by uploading any structures and images as input for the AI.

Share the unique and awesome artworks you created with hashtag #deeparteffects to the social media platforms such as Instagram, Facebook or Twitter and impress your followers. Become an deep artist with the help of machine learning algorithms using artificial intelligence in combination with neural networks! Draw in the style of artists such as Van Gogh, Monet, Leonardo da Vinci, Michelangelo, Picasso, Raphael, Rembrandt, Dali and many others! Please note: The image rights always remain with the user. Artworks and pictures are not passed to third parties.


FEATURES

Basic Version
★ Be an artist - Create Art with AI
★ Fast image processing near realtime
★ HD Resolution for artworks (1080px)
★ More than 50 filters from famous artists
★ Change style filter intensity
★ Enhanced prisma filters
★ Encrypted data transfer
★ Server in Europe for privacy
★ No photos and artworks are saved on our servers for guests
★ Use login to manage your artworks in the cloud. Delete, rename, view and organize your artworks
★ Share your artworks with the community

Premium Version
★ Create your own filters
★ FULL HD resolution for artworks (1920px)
★ Remove watermarks
★ Exclusive new styles for premium users
★ More than 120 filters from famous artists
★ No advertising

Deep Art Effects is more than filters and better than photo effects. It's a place where masterpieces happen right out of your photos. And it's you to decide what kind of art technique to base it on.
For example, you may want to convert a photo to sketch, pencil drawing or oil on canvas. And not to some abstract, exactly you have Got This App. Well, usual photo editing apps would have probably given up here. Just create art with ai. Download now and check it out.

TURN ANY PHOTO INTO ARTWORK - FOR FREE

What if Pablo Picasso painted your portrait? What if Vincent van Gogh painted Manhattan as starry night? Let’s say goodbye to the dull and traditional filter app!

We use an algorithm inspired by the human brain. It uses the stylistic elements of one image to draw the content of another. Get your own artwork in just three steps.

HOW TO GET AWESOME ARTISTIC PAINTINGS

1.) Upload your photo.
2.) Choose the style you want to transform to.
3.) Usually it is completed within a few seconds in high resolution! Super fast!

Optional: Register to manage your deep artwork

JOIN THE ART WORLD

Deep Art Effects is a collaboration between human, machine, and our concept of art. It is an experiment to see what emerges when anyone can create a masterpiece.

It is yoga for the brain. Brain for the yoga. It is a universal art machine that paints any image in the style of any other, producing sometimes-beautiful, sometimes-disturbing, always-surprising artworks.

We encourage you to play. We can't wait to see what you make with it!

Do you have any suggestions for improvement? Any ideas? Any issues with the app? Please let us know.

comments: I one year I absolutely LOVE these cute Pro Presets! 😍 Developer added tones of new presets. Now we can use search filter option. just 1 tap effects and you post pic to Instagram, FB. There are a lot of presets any type, light and airy, moody, black and white, portrait, teal and orange, ... So my Insta got many new followers. Sometimes you need a litle bit correct you settings. But The app has very detailed tutorial, it's very ease to use. Also customer service works extremely fast.great job !

I love that I can use this app on my phone away from the computer. Lots of nice presets! If you find yourself stuck on how to work it with LR, just read the instructions. I think in the future you guys should do a tutorial video for new people not savvy to tech. I bought the yearly subscription.

Finally found some filters that this app offers for free compare to others. Easy to navigate and pictures look great. I have never seen such great app with free awesome presets. The app has smoothy search option, so you can find any presets you want ... Dark, light, saturation, orange , for nature, ocean , ... If you use poor internet connection it's take some time to download the presets. But I recommend to use wifi or normal 3g. So presets download very fast. Just in a sec
Outstanding app! The best customer service too, had a question and needed help. Got a response a few minutes later. The app works and is well worth downloading!

Everytime I click open to get free presets it doesn't show up in my lightroom app. So your just downloading nothing. They asked me to change my review but they never helped me fix the problem. Why is it when I download the presets, they don't show up in my lightroom app to use? All the app does is let you download the pic that has the preset on it. It doesn't actually let you use the preset.

title: Manual Camera : DSLR - Camera Professional
description:
This Manual Camera DSLR app will turn your phone into professional camera like, with fully manual camera control on ISO, shutter speed, exposure, manual focus and another features like a professional camera, which can bring your mobile photography to the next level. Take the best capture of your photo and even record your video in 4K UHD resolution.

☆ DSLR Camera HD Professional main features : ☆

✓ Control exposure
✓ Control white balance
✓ Manual ISO *
✓ Manual focus *
✓ Control shutter speed *
✓ Save RAW photo *
✓ Real time filter / color effect
✓ 4K camera recording (on supported devices)
✓ Timelapse / fast motion video
✓ Slow motion video *
✓ Set video frame rate and bit rate
✓ Intervalometer / interval shot
✓ Geotagging
✓ Photo stamping

* Require Android 5.0+ with Camera2API enabled by phone manufacture

It's an excellent fast camera app, perform quickly giving your fast camera performance which is able to take many pictures at some interval in burst mode, very useful for creating stop motion or time lapse video

Create photos with different effects and another pro hd camera pro features like manual exposure lock, manual ISO, white balance, hd camera pro grid view, golden ratio grid, etc. and reach the highest level of dslr photography with this dslr camera professional.

DSLR Camera Professional additional features :

* Burst camera app with configurable delay to create stop motion or create time lapse video
* Face detection / facial recognition
* Front back hd camera pro selection, save raw photo only using rear camera
* Professional camera hd features: Scene mode, focus mode, burst mode, color effects, white balance, and manual exposure lock, manual ISO.
* Choose to and 4k video quality and resolution.
* 4K camera recording (With optional audio recording) like professional camera hd
* Option to turn off the shutter sound.
* GUI to change the orientation without any pause works in any direction.* Adjustable volume keys (image to zoom receive or change the exposure compensation).
* Excellent and fast camera / burst camera hd performance
* Remote control (optional audio countdown) timer (with configurable delay) automatic repeat mode.
* Customable volume keys to perform quick operation like dslr camera app
* HD camera feature to adjust shutter speed
* Manual Focus like DSLR camera halide
* HD camera feature to choose manual ISO like procam halide
* Manual Exposure
* Location targeting feature
* Remove with multi-touch gesture and single-touch control.
* Option to lock the photo or 4k video in portrait or landscape orientation.
* 4K video recording on supported device, turn your phone into 4k camera app
* Realtime Photo Filter on procam halide
* Photo Grid : 4K camera line, golden ration line
* Disable the shutter sound / silent camera mode when take photo or record 4k video
* Optional GPS location tagging (geotagging), photos and videos; For photos that compass direction contains.
* A date and time stamp on photos, raw photo, location coordinates and implements a custom text.
* (Some) external microphone support.
* Manual focus distance; manual ISO / iso dslr photography ;
manual camera exposure lock; RAW (DNG) files on front back manual camera
* Manual ISO / iso manual or just balance ISO ( set iso manual )
* Flash mode feature like procam halide
* Save JPG and RAW Photo for dslr photography
* Brightness / exposure setting
* Burst camera mode useful for creating time lapse or stop motion which required interval shooting
* Unlock phone manual camera professional capability to record at 4k camera on supported devices

All complete features like dslr photography packaged in small compact size and clean interface,
Download this professional camera hd and start record your 4k video

Note :

To use all manual camera features you need device with Android 5.0 and up which is support camera2 API, you will know that your device is supported if you can find “enable camera2api” option in setting menu.

comments: was ok. manual focus, the reason i purchased it, was very odd, jumped over a very small range around where focus was in, and made my tablet's lens click. i've owned this thing for a few years and never *heard* the autofocus complain, let alone loudly. the ui is surprisingly close to camera zoom fx, which causes my phone's haptic vibrator (*not* autofocus) to freak out when manual mode is set and any attempt is made to focus. on the the next camera app!

I got it for free today because it was listed as "sale" and the price was crossed out. Unfortunately, it lacks some features that other camera apps of the same type have. The highest resolution available is only 13.0 mp on the rear camera. Also, the UI is outdated and not fluid. I couldn't adjust the ISO and EV because it was wrongly placed. I hope the developer would address the aforementioned problems. Anyways, I got it for free, so I'll just reserve it and wait for the next big update.

Fan Freaking Tastic!!!!!! This very well might be the best camera app I've ever used!!!! Too early to say. I literally just downloaded it and used it for a single photo, but so far I love it!!! Have wanted a manual focus for a long time, and this app seems to exploit the device camera to the best of it's abilities!!! I'm no camera or photography expert, but the app seems to be worth it's weight in gold!!! Hahahaha!!! But seriously, so far I love it!!! Happy hunting!!!

Very nice quality photos but the taken photos cannot be reviewed within the app itself.. you will have to go to file/photo manager first before able to see what you have taken through this camera app. but the quality of photos take are really impressive despite of that photo viewer

Photos not saveing and manual mode show glitch on captured secene. I taking shot then after sometime app give me this message "failed to save photo" message :( GUI bad not easy manual settings hide under the exposure etc...

title: Glitch Lab
description:
Glitch Lab brings well known effects as well as novel ideas to the world of digital glitch art, following the philosophy of simplicity, power and control of its predecessor apps.

Effects are organized into categories and span a wide array in and around the concept of glitch art. 

Glitch Lab is simple to use yet at the same time endlessly configurable. Filters combine to produce endless variations of your art.

Effects
Over 100 effects covering:
★ Color
★ Streaking, Breaking, Repeating, Data corruption
★ Pixel Sorting
★ Retro (Pixelation, Scanlines etc.)
★ 3D (sphere, voxel, smooth surfaces and more)
★ Text and gimmicks
★ Art filters

Powerful user interface
★ Infinite undo/redo
★ Erase parts of the last applied effect (PRO)
★ Bookmark images to save progress or reuse as masks
★ Area of effect options (activate from settings)

Video
Glitch Lab comes with a powerful animation module. Create smooth videos with parameter interpolation between key frames (be sure to activate video from the app settings).

PRO Version
Available as an in-app purchase, the PRO version comes with extra filters, extra parameters, higher resolutions and lossless file saving (PNG).

recentChanges: New maximum save resolution upgraded to 14MP for PRO version, accessible when disabling Quick Save mode from the settings
comments: It's only my first day using the Pro version, and I'm absorbed into it. I really like it. There's a lot to absorb yet...I wish the visual tutorials were a little easier to follow. I'm managing to discover a lot on my own. Maybe I'll change my mind as time goes by, but right now it's 5 star.

As I have said with Croma and Mirro Lab, this is a fantastic app. The filters are mesmerising and great fun to play with. I can lose, or more accurately, spend usful hours with this app. It has to be one of the very best free apps. I love it.

I absolutely love this app!! I invite. Other people to try it as well! Some stuff are strange such as filing, there's no proper way to look at previous projects, which may make it hard to go back and edit previous projects, but then again it's a free app with no adds!! Amazing stuff!!

Cool... Actually, so cool that it kills the storage of my mobile. You can make and save many variants with different effects and leave yourself completely clueless about which one you will go with; obviously for next steps of editing with more other possibilities. It is a plain and minimal application with nothing unfunctional and/or buggy and has the simplest UI. Great app, thanks.

An excellent app, for sure. Put in the time, discover your talent, express yourself. Glitch is art too. Note to the dev/s: after using the eraser function, it usually saves the picture without registering the previously applied changes from the eraser tool. A fix for that would be tremendously appreciated.

title: Gallery - photo gallery, album
description:
Gallery app is simple, modern, light and fast photo gallery and picture manager app for viewing and organizing your photos and videos. 

Main features:
🌟 Beautiful simple and fast photo gallery
🌟 Quickly search pictures, GIF, videos and albums
🌟 Use the photo viewer to sort and view files
🌟 Easy to share pictures and videos to social media, email or anywhere else

comments: I have bought this app some time ago. Problems: 1. App doesn't keep photos in chronical order (Very upsetting) 2. When I copy photo to another album and such photo already exists there, it makes it double. So I end up having many doubles in the same album. There are many less advanced gallery apps which are showing warning pop-up window that such photo exists, then giving option to skip or overrite. Please take care of that!

Just what I was looking for- After moving from one plus to pixel, I noticed the stock photos app & Google go didn't have customisation options. This app has all what I was looking for and more. Also bare bones permisions is a plus. Definite recommendation.

I liked this app and decided to buy the premium version when I was offered a one-time 70% discount offer. However, after paying, I realised that I was still deducted for the full amount! So, I'm wondering if it was a genuine offer or not?
Player is horrible. It doesn't recognize avi and you have to long press to choose a different player. Why do videos and photos have to be separate?
I do not know how anyone can rate this app in a more positive fashion. This app can't even keep my pictures in folders by chronical order and all of what I download, keep working on it.

title: Fotoo - Digital Photo Frame Photo Slideshow Player
description:
Turn your tablet/TV/phone into an elegant digital photo frame and photo slideshow player!

You can stream your photos seamlessly from local photo gallery and cloud services such as Google Photos, Dropbox, Google drive, Microsoft OneDrive, local network (Samba/SMB) and more to come!

Key Features:
🔷 Slideshow and photo frame with cloud photos from Google Photos, Dropbox, Google Drive, Microsoft OneDrive, Samba/SMB, etc.
🔷 Slideshow and photo frame with local photos from photo gallery
🔷 Slideshow and photo frame with background music 
🔷 Slideshow and photo frame with various photo display effects
🔷 Slideshow and photo frame with various photo transition effects
🔷 Display weather and time on the photo frame and slideshow
🔷 Display photo information like date/location of the photo on the photo frame and slideshow
🔷 Set photos to auto-play at scheduled time
🔷 Auto-play as screensaver 

Fotoo is the best digital photo frame and slideshow app that allows photo streaming from the most popular cloud storage service. As a digital photo frame and slideshow app, it provides great photo streaming experience with beautiful display and transition effects as well as other unique features. 

With such a digital photo frame and photo slideshow app, your precious moments never fade away.

comments: Great app - one of the few actually worth the premium ticket. Does an *excellent* job of turning old tablet into a digital photo frame - the only one out of all I've tested that does a half-decent job. Good protocols support, including LAN (SMB). Would be even better if support for social media (FB, IG, etc). A little too resource-hungry for everyday use on mobile; would've liked to be able replace 'Photo Table' Android (daydream) screensaver. Ability to cache to SD would be great

I bought this app almost two weeks ago and got the premium version on top of it and it has alot of great features but the photo shuffle options sucks ! I have over 350+ photos and it only ever displays about 30 to 40 of the same photos over and over again and it doesn't matter what photo order I use because it is the same results ! I think paying 25 dollars plus tax is pathetic for the results I got. Very disappointed.

Very disappointed, especially having purchased the Premium version. On one album, the app refuses to shuffle into some photo date ranges and endlessly displays from a restricted date range (album loaded to Google Photos). Also hangs occasjonally. No other complaints so far, but this is a significant defect. Update 2 Aug. To clarify, the app chooses only from a restricted date range in ALL photo order settings. I don't think orientation is relevant - my 2 albums are landscape and portrait/square

This does exactly what it's supposed to do and is so easy to use. Something screwed up in the built in screen saver in my LG. I tried everything wouldn't work so I found this app and it's nice and easy with good options at the free level and if you want there's extras too

Excellent app with lots of options. Best I've tried. Does ALMOST everything I want. Only thing that seems to be missing is the ability to change the colour of the text in the decoration section (file name, location etc). Would be 4.5 stars because of this for me, but can't give it that and it is worth more than 4 stars, so gets the 5 stars.

title: NeonArt Photo Editor: Photo Effects, Collage Maker
description:
NeonArt photo editor offers you the best photo editing experience with dozens of neon effects and neon spirals. Your amazing pictures will grab all the attention with neon sketch art. Get ready for the new generation pics art experience with the shiny grime stickers and stylish text. Face tune and retouch selfies just in one tap, then add motion and astonishing picture effects. Picture editing is so easy and fun with NeonArt. When you are done with picture editing, collage your beautiful pics with the pic collage maker using the glowing photo grids. Magic photo editor brings fun to your photos with the gradient neon line art. Combine stunning sketch art with the cool drip effects. Try stylish glowing sketch and grime stickers, then share your artwork on Instagram, Facebook, Snapchat, Twitter, VK and Tik Tok to get many likes :).

🎨  Aesthetic Picture Editor: 
NeonArt picture editor has all the picture editing tools to create fabulous artworks.  No crop is needed to share your brilliant pic on social media. Combine neon effects with retro filters for pictures :) . Try neon sketch art in many different glowing colors. Explore astonishing drip effect and create a cyberpunk background from a neon background to make your pic stand out :) . 

✨ Neon Photo Effects and Spirals: 
 Let your pictures glow in the dark with neon photo effects :) . Emoji backgrounds and colorful picture frames are here for you to create marvellous pictures. Surprising AI spiral editor has vast amount of neon spirals to bring motion to your pics. There are even some epic spirals available made of emojis and flowers. Use beautiful geometric spirals like circles or triangles to create digital art :) . Finalize magic photo editing with cool neon frame for pictures.

😎  Background Changer: 
Remove background in one tap and add a pretty neon background easily :) . You can find yourself in a street full of lights in one tap thanks to the neon backgrounds. Many glowing background designs and cyber punk photo collages available for you. 

💖  Neon Stickers and Text: 
To personalize your pics use some image stickers and celebrate special days like birthdays. Also there are loads of cute animal stickers, pick one and change it’s size easily. There are dozens of glowing text templates, also you can type whatever you like and change it’s style and color to personalize your photos. Magic cyber punk photo editor pro has all the features you need.

🤳  Selfie Camera Effects: 
NeonArt comes up with a magnificent selfie camera. Snap selfie and add camera effects in one tap :). Selfie camera finds the best light for you and smoothens your face automatically. Enjoy the live selfie camera effects and cyber-punk filters for pictures now! Dripping effect is perfect for selfies. Try bewildering drip effects and bring out your inner drip artist. Neon photo editor will bring you a brand-new image.

🎉  Pic Collage Maker and Photo Grids: 
Using the photo filters and editing tools like AI spirals and sketch art you‘ll have dozens of pretty selfies :) . NeonArt photo collage maker helps you to montage you pictures to prepare memes. Shiny photo grids, image layouts and cyberpunk frames will make your picture collaging experience super fun and easy. Photo collage maker has photo layouts for all tastes, create breath taking photo collage and funny memes just in seconds. Don’t forget to explore neon stickers and cyber-punk effect for the unforgettable photo collage experience.

NeonArt photo editor pro is best photo editing app with neon blend effects and awesome filters for pictures. Edit like a pro and combine drip effects with the glowing spirals to create cyber punk theme. You’ll love the gradient neon line art with hand drawn sketch designs. Finally use pic collage maker to montage pics in one special post. You don’t need any other photo editing app, once you have Neon photo editor. Share your artwork on Instagram, Facebook, Snapchat, Twitter, VK and TikTok to get many likes :)
