title: 500px – Photo Sharing & Photography Community
description:
500px is the premier community and social network for aspiring and practicing photographers. Over 15M creatives from 195 countries come to 500px to discover and share incredible photos, gain global exposure, and get paid for their work and skills. 

Whether you're a hobbyist or seasoned pro, with 500px, you can get exposure in front of a photography focused community for free. Support and connect with other photographers you love and use insights into how your photos perform to rank in the community. 

With a growing community of photographers constantly uploading new photos, 500px is where you can express yourself, share beautiful photos, and connect with a creative photography community.

Our enormous catalog of diverse photography styles and genres lets you discover amazing astrophotography, landscape photography, portrait photography, black and white photography, and much more.

500px offers a variety of tools for all levels of photographer. Join our premier photography community, connect with other photographers, and grow your skills.

Explore inspired photos
Enjoy the best photos from around the world. Millions of photos are ranked by our system in real-time based on feedback from our enormous network of photographers. Every time you log in to 500px, you'll not only see great photos, but you'll also see something incredible you haven't seen before.

Challenge yourself
Upload your best work to see if it will be popular with our network of talented photographers. Push yourself to beat your ranking and define your style with every photo you share. Your work could even make it to Editors' Choice—our picks of the best photos on the platform. Challenge yourself with Quests—photo contests to test your skills, get recognized for your work, and you could win exciting prizes!

Discover new styles
Follow the work of photographers you admire, and find your next favorite with personalized recommendations based on your tastes. Interact with photographers in the comments or via direct message to learn more about inspiring photos. Download 500px now to be among great photography.

comments: The app sucks. I can't utilize the quick upload directly from an image in my gallery even though there is a link for it. It's constantly prompting me to turn on device location. I have problems with signing up and logging in. When I choose to login with Google account, a new window appears with the words "You need to enable javascript bla..bla..bla...". When I try to log in again with Google account, the new window doesn't even come out and the app doesn't respond. When I try to log in with Facebook, the application even says that my email / username or password is incorrect.

Its easy to use. I signed up for a subscription and wanted to monetize my images. Well despite one of my images getting a 91.4 pulse rating and 51 likes in 24 hours they said no one would be interested in it.. and there's no way to dispute one persons wrong opinion. Fine, I will cancel my subscription.

Why you add new feature without testing? Why Limited access photoes so broken in Mobile app? Where I can find the way to open it? Why photoes isnt loaded in mobile web version of site (endless spinner and nothing heppen)? Why start slider button isnt worked on limited access photo, when this photo opened in app from redirected website? So much bugs🤮 thats why I want to cencel my purchase and delete my profile forever

title: TextArt - Text To Photo, Photo Text Editor
description:
The best app to Add text to pictures in 2021 

 Photo text editor a free app that lets you write meaningful messages on an image, it could be an excerpt of someone, a life adage, or just a few lines of mood you want to share with your friends. Creating meaningful quote images on your own, Facebook or desktop/ phone cover photos... has been simpler than ever before.
 In addition to the main feature, which is add words to picture, you can insert a sticker, frame the image, create the effect...

 The salient feature of Photo text editor:

 ✔ Professional Design Interface with Ease of use
 ✔ Thousands of handpicked Packages of picturesque images
 ✔ Apply one of more than a hundred beautiful filters
 ✔ The huge updated text and image library helps you to create more solid pictures than ever before.
 ✔ Insert Clipart: You can insert in hilarious images, and these arcs support a wide range of topics, such as animal images, smiley faces, flowers, and so on.
 ✔ Put in a frame: There are many beautiful frame patterns that you can choose, all divided into different subjects so that you can find them easily.
 ✔ Create Textures: If you want your image to look like a sheet of Paper, pick Textures as Paper and then choose your style, which one you like.
 ✔ Add visual effects: This feature creates many beautiful effects on the image.,
 ✔ Basic image editing operations: Aggregating basic image editing features such as Resize images (Resize), Cutting images, turning images, creating round corners for the sides of an image, obscuring images, and the feature undo/ Redo saves time to edit images

 Photo text editor is a mobile application that allows you to perform text on photo. You can easily add your favorite quotes to any photo. From there, you absolutely can easily create pictures of sparkling love without spending too much time by Photo to text.

 The Photo Text editor has all the features you need to create beautiful pictures.
 Other than Typography, some of the other things that people are implanted with are the weather, the music, the messages, the frames, etc., that you still see are everywhere. Also, note that the original image of you must be bright before insertion. The less elaborate the picture is, the easier it is to insert and the words stand out.

 About Text Photo Editor application for adding text to photos :
Photo editor text is still in the development period, so we always look forward to receiving your feedback. We will definitely upgrade and develop more features as you require.

title: Solocator - GPS Field Camera
description:
Solocator is a GPS camera for fieldwork. Overlay and stamp photos with GPS location, compass direction, altitude, date & time taken + with Industry Pack (In-App Purchase) capture editable notes such as project name and photo description, street address and UTM/MGRS coordinate formats. It can auto save 2 photos to camera roll at once - Stamped photo and original photo. You can also view photo direction and location in map view and navigate there. So now you will always know where and when a photo was taken and how to get back there.

TAILOR THE INFO YOU CAPTURE
You can choose what information you want to overlay on your photos to suit your fieldwork.

Choices include: 
- GPS Location (Latitude & Longitude in various formats) ± Accuracy
- Compass Direction – Bearing
- Altitude (Metric & Imperial units)
- Date & time
- Show Compass 
- Show Cardinal points in Building mode; e.g. North or South Elevations of a building face.
- Option to use abbreviations or Unicode characters for direction, position and altitude.


WORKING WITH CAPTURED INFO
- Options to take and auto save two photos to Camera Roll at once; one with stamped info and the other as an original photo.
- Photos are sorted by time, location, distance from current location and by project name (if Industry Pack is purchased).
- View photo direction and location in map view and navigate there
- Save photos with metadata in Exif format to camera roll
- Export photos to Google Drive and Dropbox
- Share photos on Facebook & Twitter
- Email photos from within the app including:
  • Exif metadata
  • Compass Direction
  • GPS Position ± accuracy
  • Altitude
  • Date & Time taken
  • Street address (if selected)
  • Elevation of building face viewed (if selected)
  • Links to maps so receiver can navigate there easily


INDUSTRY PACK (In-App Purchase)

EDITABLE NOTES 
Stamp your photos with "Project name" & "Description". The project name field could be used as job or policy number etc. You can also go back and amend project name or description or just add the notes later when you’re in the office.

YOUR WATERMARK
Customize your photos by stamping your own watermark. e.g. company name, team or photographer name. 

STREET MODE
Selecting street mode overlays photos with street address.

ADDITIONAL COORDINATE FORMATS
UTM and MGRS grid coordinate formats 

CUSTOM EXPORTING & EMAILING
Export or email multiple photos and photo info in KML, KMZ or CSV formats. Attach maps of photo locations along with your photos when exporting or emailing.
Select your combination of photos, maps and captured info in the file formats to suit your needs. Export/email photos individually or as a zip file.

REFINE AND LOCK GPS LOCATION 
Ideal for those working in and around buildings; to improve your GPS location. You can also use it to lock the position of the asset or subject you’re photographing as opposed to where you’re standing.

SWITCH OFF CAPTURE MODES – GREATER FLEXIBILITY
Switch Compass, Building and Street modes off and just show GPS info bar on top of photos. Gives you more flexibility on what and how you overlay info and show more of the photo.

IMPORTANT NOTE - DEVICES WITHOUT A COMPASS
From v2.18 we have made Solocator accessible for incompatible devices that do not have a compass. These devices are without a magnetometer (magnetic sensor), which means the compass and some direction features in the app wont function as designed. However, when you change/update to a device with a compass all directional features will be enabled to work as intended.

developerAddress: 11 Apollo Avenue, Baulkham Hills NSW Australia
recentChanges:
• Added a selection of photo sizes for KMZ files.
• Added photo number as an option in user defined photo marker titles in KML/KMZ files.
• Bug fix to include photo details for outlook email users.
comments: Only one complaint. The response time for the camera capturing a photo with this app is often delayed. I use this app for jobsite inspection work, and too often do I upload my photos and find photos of the ground instead of what I actually tried to capture or missing photos I know that took. Be sure to hold your phone in steadily in place a few seconds after taking your photo to ensure it actually registers.

Downloading photos directly from phone to computer is almost impossible. There's no solocator folder in phone for photos. Besides it saves the same photo three times. Which makes your phone run out of space quickly. Also trouble opening photos using Windows photo viewer. A message indicates there is not enough memory to open the photos.

Generally a good app, but the watermark options are very limited, it would be good if you could import your companies or organisations logo (you are able to do this on surveycam so i find myself using it most of the time).
Probably the best and most useful app I've downloaded. Worth spending time exploring configurations to suit your needs. Works seamlessly with Google Earth. Gobsmacked how good this app is.

Does the advertised job of overlaying photos with location and direction data. It also embedded exif data just fine. The photos I took imported into Google Maps with no problem. It's a little buggy, though. For a while, it took two photos without the overlay for each one photo with the overlay. Also, it turned my flash on and kept it on like a flashlight. I was also not thrilled to pay for a nap, and then it be immediately offered to pay more for an in-app purchase. the price of the app is low, so it's not that big a deal. But it sure is tacky.

title: Quotes Creator
description:
Share your own thoughts or words with picture. Quotes Creator is the best quote maker app to create your quote. Create beautiful inspirational text pictures and sayings images for Instagram. Add poems or quotes to a photo and share your thoughts on Instagram. You can also add your own watermark, logo and QR code.

Quotes Creator is the best and easiest way to create and share your quotes with the world. Quotes Creator ready with customizing options such as background, text colors, text size, and fonts, or you can choose your photo from your Photo Gallery to be used as background, so you can share your own quotes with your friends.

Write your quote, poems, emotions, thoughts, haiku or any kind of writings and design them into visually stunning posts using creative designing tools. Make your quote eye-catching with beautiful backgrounds. Quote Creator app has 1000+ beautiful HD images that suits your quote. We also added features of solid color and gradient as a background.

Quotes Creator is a perfectly built with good design (UI) and user experience. It's a easy, best and user friendly quote generator and quote maker app ever.
After customizing your own quote, you can save / share with the world via Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp or other apps.



Features:

- Beautiful and user friendly design.
- Set amazing background from gallery and put your precious words on picture and share with world.
- We Provides huge quotes library with beautiful Inspiration, Motivational, Life and Love Quotes by Authors and Topics. So, you can put inspiring quotes on your own background.
- 55+ Amazing in built fonts and background templates.
- You can set font colors and Size.
- Add inspiring words to images
- Add captions to photos
- You can give photo effects like Blur, Brightness, Saturation, Contrast and Colors to your background.
- You can set shadow on text
- You can set your favorite color and color gradient as a background.
- Share with Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp and other apps.
- 100+ unique and creative font choices
- You can Choose backgrounds from high quality background collections.
- You can save your own template
- Manage template : Put your favorite template first.
- Choose fantastic quotes randomly
- Extensive collection of quotations by famous authors, celebrity, scientist, businessman and great persons.




Here's how people use Quotes Creator


- Add text to photos
- Create daily inspiring quotes
- Add text over picture and write captions on pictures
- Social Media Banners - Facebook cover page, YouTube, Twitter
- Best app to create quote for instagram or insta quote.
- Add logo on photo or image.
- Add text to pictures
- Add watermark on photo. You can add text watermark, photo watermark, logo and QR code on image.
- Create quote wallpapers
- Create inspirational, motivational, love, life, success, spirit, happiness, funny, friendship and positive HD quote wallpaper.
- Write quote, poems, short stories, thoughts and much more.




There are 20 high quality wallpapers and backgrounds packages.

1. Artistic
2. Love
3. Nature
4. Night
5. Light
6. Grunge
7. Texture
8. Paper
9. Dreamy
10. Star
11. Space
12. Christmas
13. Spring
14. Winter
15. Geometric
16. Autumn
17. Cloudy
18. Water Color
19. Floral Texture
20. Poster Mock up



FEEDBACK & SUGGESTION

Thanks for all the support and suggestion! Your feedback is hugely important to us and we're working hard to make this app awesome.
We love your feedback/suggestion - send us an email at feedback@quotescreator.com anytime!



JOIN OUR COMMUNITY

"Get Inspired, Stay Inspired" with our awesome gallery by finding us @QuotesCreatorApp on Instagram.
Check out what our users have been making by searching for #QuotesCreator on Instagram!



NEED HELP?

We are ready to help you. Reach us at feedback@quotescreator.com - We'll do our best to help you with your issue as soon as possible!

comments: This app is so good that you can write what you want with different types of background color, different fonts, sizes and it does not have any ad which is the best part you will get so much without any premium One of the best app.

Why am I being served ads when I paid for pro so that I wouldn't be (and previously wasn't) served ads?? Thanks for ripping me off. Also they try to turn your review into an email (probably only if you rate lower than 4 or 5) which is pretty scummy and misleading in itself. Was going to rate a 2, now a 1, because of that.

I have used this for years to create poster images for social media and my blog. I eventually paid a small amount for a background package and love all of the choices. It does not do everything, but it's not meant to. For easy, beautiful quotes it is exactly what I need.
I paid for Pro but it is still not active. I hate it. So many other people also having similar issue. Seems like fraud now. Waste of time and money. Uninstalling...

There are various styles that seem to never get or look boring. I've used this app for months and it's ran smoothly. This app is updated regularly and the fonts, styles, backgrounds are always free. Definitely worth a try!

title: Effects Photo Editor, Filters, Presets - Photochic
description:
PhotoChic - Best Photo Editor for tons of effects in one click. Double exposure, fragmenting dispersion effect, cartoon filters, glitch effects, neon effects, photo blur and so on, all in one editor. With this Aesthetic Picture Editor, all cool photo effects in one click. Just add your photo and post to Instagram, Whatsapp, Facebook, Pinterest for dozens likes. 


Double exposure
- A technique that combines two different exposures or images that are layered on top of each other. 
- Both images can be seen producing an almost ghost-like image. They tend to produce uniquely stylized images. 

Fragmenting dispersion effect  
- Choose your Amazing Pixel Effect Shapes.
- More than 40+ Dispersion Pixel Effect Available.
- Choose a direction for particle dispersion effect.

AI Cartoon Photo Editor: 
- Cartoon art Filters, pencil art Filters, drawing and color pencil sketch effect.
- With art filters to cartoon yourself free and transform your picture into an avatar
 
Glitch effects
- vintage photo with trippy effects like vhs camcorder.
- Random glitches & 3d glitch trippy effects.
- Grainy & pixelated effects.
 
PhotoChic is the best photo editing app with amazing effects for pictures. Edit photos like an artist and Share your pic on Instagram, Facebook, Whatsapp, Snapchat, VK, Tumblr, Flickr, Twitter and Pinterest to get lots of likes! If you have any problems or suggestions, feel free to let us know.

title: Face Camera: Photo Filters, Emojis, Live Stickers
description:
Face camera is the best photo filter app for pic with the funny camera effects. With the stunning live photo filters directly on your face.You can snap perfect selfie & video with its funny face filters, cute stickers, and unique camera effects. Various live camera filters are in this app. Snap a sweet selfie with cute funny face filters like Snapchat, including dog filter, and other like cat filter, rabbit filter, trendy photo filters with Face Camera. Besides, Face camera has many funny and cute stickers as angel wings. Best picture art experience with the Face Cam!Let’s take wonderful pictures and share your awesome photo on Instagram, Facebook, Snapchat, Twitter, and Tik Tok with the face cam. 

Selfie camera with Funny Stickers: 
Over 2800 special cute animal face stickers in Sweet face camera. Face live camera stickers like Vocation stickers, Cute Animal stickers, Tattoo sticker, Beard stickers, etc. Snap a sweet selfie or shoot a video with the face camera! Bring some fun to your selfie with the cute animal stickers and emojis. 😊 Also, take pictures for kids in your family with funny camera effects and have a lot of fun together!

 Funny Face Live camera Filters: 
Cute cat?🐱 Lovely dog? 🐶Shinning princess? 👸Adorable rabbit? 🐰Take a cute selfie with our funny animal face filters like Snapchat. Famous dog filter, cat filter, and other 2020 trendy photo filters like a baby filter are available in Sweet Face Camera. Great entertainment for kids! Take funny pictures together with our sweet face camera! We will have a great face game together in this filter camera! 

 Various Face Filters: 
Food? Scenery? Portrait? The sweet face camera comes up with free photo filters. Whatever you do, various filters in Sweet face camera will make every selfie photo amazing. Face camera automatically makes your selfie more beautiful with the face filters, like V-shape your face, smoothens your skin, etc., even give you auto-makeup. Only a few seconds to take a perfect picture with the selfie camera by using this stylish filter camera. Choose one camera filters that fit your style the best!

Real-time beauty effects: 
Acne? blemishes? pimples? Get flawless skin, sparkly eyes, a straighter nose, etc. in just ONE tap! Edit photos and retouch your photo with the fabulous camera beauty effects. In this Face App, our face effects are great for sweet selfies, you can take a picture with the beautiful angel effect, princess effect, or other funny beauty effects. 
Choose one camera effect your favorite!

Makeup Camera: 
Multiple choices of the popular eyebrow, lipstick, blusher, and contour. In this face camera, you can find the makeup style that best suits you. Sweet Face cam automatically makes your pictures more beautiful with face filters, so you don’t need to wear makeup and retouch selfies. All trendy filters are available including famous Instagram filters. Various popular makeup selfie effects make your selfies mesmerizing even when you’re makeup-less.

Easily Share: 
Save high-quality photos and VIDEO!
When you are done editing, you can share to popular social sites like Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, Messenger, YouTube, Tik Tok, and Snapchat right from Sweet Face Camera.

With this snap camera, every photo editor functions are free in one face app. All the funny camera effects and live animal stickers are here for you to snap videos and sweet selfies. Snap a sweet selfie with the face cam, sharing your photo with friends on Snapchat, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, VK, and Tik Tok to get many likes.

title: Totsie – Baby Photo Editor
description:
** #1 Pregnancy & Baby Milestone app **

Totsie turns your baby's precious little moments into lasting memories. Capture adorable pregnancy & baby milestone photos by adding gorgeous hand crafted stickers & custom text. Create heart melting comparison collages to track your pregnancy and baby journey. Safety save baby pics to your own private time capsule or share with friends and family instantly.
______________________________________

YOU'LL LOVE TOTSIE APP!

1000+ STICKERS 
1000+ hand crafted stickers to mark your little ones exciting milestones, firsts & special moments. New stickers released every month! 

GORGEOUS FONTS
Select from adorable typography. Add sentimental text to tell your baby story. 

CUTE COLLAGES
Create heart melting collages. Be amazed at how your bump and baby have grown with this unique keepsake feature.

FUN FILTERS 
Add gorgeous filters to highlight special moments. Transform your photos with a single tap.

TIME CAPSULE 
Safely save your baby pics to your own private time capsule. Cherish the memories forever. 

SHARE MEMORIES
Share precious creations with friends and family in seconds via social media, text or email 
______________________________________

Want inspo? 
Check us out on Instagram or Facebook. @TotsieApp #TotsieApp
Tag @TotsieApp + #TotsieApp for your chance to be featured

Need help?
Contact us at support@totsieapp.com 
Letting us know via email gets things fixed.

The Totsie team xx
www.totsieapp.com

Privacy Policy: https://www.totsieapp.com/legal#privacy

title: MomentCam Cartoons & Stickers
description:
MomentCam allows you to create funny Cartoons and Emoticons from your photos.

Just select a picture from your Album and instantly create your own personalized avatar. You can then pick one of our backgrounds from thousands available, and customize your caricature entirely.

With backgrounds updated daily and for every occasion, region, cultural and pop reference, MomentCam will keep you coming back for more.

Create your own personalized emoticons to express your mood in the funniest or cutest possible way

FEATURES:

title: Photo Studio PRO
description:
Photo Studio is a powerful multifunctional photo editing application for photographers of any level. It contains the vast editing kit of tools for basic and advanced retouching of your photos. Make each your shot a perfect complete art-work using a wide range of effects, filters, text editing and color enhancement tools and a lot of other ready-to-use features.

Main features:

1. More than 200 unique filters, amazing special effects, a big collection of picture-in-picture effects, rich set of various frames for any event of your life, huge amount of stickers, textures, shapes and correction tools – lighting tune, color correction, sharpening, lens boost, tilt shift, blur and more.

2. Use manual correction tools to highlight, fix or improve any part or object on your photo. Use mask correction tool to apply filters, effects or tune your photo selectively.

3. Collage editor allows to combine several photos into amazingly looking photo collages with a wide variety of adjustable frames, shapes, customizable backgrounds, templates and stickers.

4. Magic tools comprising the following outstanding features:  Blend feature for combining of two images together using a big collection of masks, backgrounds and blend modes; Color Splash is aimed to highlight objects on a photo; Clone stamp is intended to copy objects, change or erase a background; Shapes editor helps to combine photos with multiple variations of shapes, textures and backgrounds. 

5. Impressive text editing tool is designed for creation of nice-looking messages on your photos with rich collection of customizable fonts, color, textures and shapes.

6. About 50 additional content packages expanding the photo editing process with new effects, frames, textures, fonts and templates. Our team's constantly working hard to implement new stunning features to gain the #1 photo editor title. 

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/kvadgroup/
Facebook: http://facebook.com/kvadgroup
Twitter: http://twitter.com/kvadgroup
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMfsIMOqr-FKZnb6yQAltIA/videos

I did some overlays and sketch filters for my friends dog. 🐕💕 Some tutorial examples were pics most people won't have. A book with blank pages is a great or amazing castles etc. But I take zoo pics, Birds. Snapshots. I would suggest more "sophisticated" accessories by that I mean more adult things to choose. Ty!

The best editor on the Android market. I love the new feature to add stickers from files. However I noticed that it has to be PNG images. The JPEG images are grey out. Suggestion would be to add JPEG images as well. Keep up the great work 👍
Very good photo editor app. Will be complete and get 5 * if they include proper AI background removal & object removal tools.

Wow! I was not expecting this to be any better than photo processing apps I have been using or tried, but it's blown me away the sheer amount of stuff available to mess with and try out. Not only that but the ability to adjust effects you decide to you is a huge win. I will definitely be keeping this app around even if I give up the play pass. Take. My. Money.

title: Photo Collage Maker, PIP, Photo Editor, Grid
description:
A wise choice for editing photos, creating photo collages and making free cards! There're  hundreds of grid layouts, sizes, exclusive stickers and filters for you to choose. You can even draw on your collages with unique doodle patterns, use spiral effect and add mosaic anywhere you want.

Photo Collage Maker 
Variety of Instant grid layouts and templates to choose from. Instant grid layouts for photos.  Create a square photo collage in seconds with grid feature! Just select several pictures, Collage Maker & Editor instantly remix them into cool photo collage. You can pick layout you like best, edit collage with filter, sticker, text and much more. Combine up to 9 photos to create pic collage, you can swap/rotate/crop pictures/square photo, adjust frames, edit border of collage, change background color as you like.  

Change the Sky
Use auto cutout to change the photo background. Change the sky in a few seconds. Use spiral effect to make creative artworks. 

PIP Collage Maker 
Special PIP collage frames with different shape and style to make your photos ordinary to extraordinary. With this amazing PIP function you can make a collage with creative and funny photo frames like broadcast, prison, wanted warrant, billboard, newspaper movie screen and old television, creating a stunning picture-in-picture effect. We provide variety of material like templates, PIP, stickers. You can use Collage Maker in different occasions like wedding, birthday, valentine’s day. Make your own romantic scrapbook

Pixelate
You can use mosaic to cover up watermark or blur areas you do not want to show.

Photo Editor 
Sticker & Text 
Personalize your photo collage with 500+ stickers, cute emoji and text styles. Edit your pictures with thousands of fun and trendy stickers! 50+ Fonts allow you to write texts that suit any photography!

Filter 
Plenty of amazing filters to meet all your needs: beautify self camera shot(selfies) and selfie videos, HDR filter, photograph with stylish filters, make a video with modern/classic filters... 

Editing 
Crop, cut, rotate your images, frame your images in full 1:1 aspect ratio! Easy rotation, crop or resize of photos. There're a lot of romantic themes to choose such as Happy Birthday/Merry Christmas/Happy Valentine's day/Happy New Year...

Adjust 
Beautify your photos by adding and adjusting HDR effects to give your photos a professional artwork style finish.

Graffiti 
Doodle on your pictures with preset drawing effects, including Mosaic, Highlighter…Feeling not creative enough? Then do your own graffiti to make a stunning photo collage!

Share
Easily sharing your photos on social media. Collage Maker is a smooth and flexible image studio/image editor for you to collage photo, make PIP, crop and edit pictures.

Collage Maker - Photo Collage Maker & Photo Editor, Grid is a free collage app/ montage maker/picture maker/picture editor for you to collage photos/add layouts, frames, stickers, pixelization and DIY card templates to send greetings to friends and family. Record your precious moments like wedding/birthday/Valentine's Day/Thanksgiving Day/Christmas. 

We’re so happy you chose us as your photo editor and photo collage maker, and we are excited to see what you made!

title: Rarevision VHS Camcorder 📼📹 Retro 80s Cam
description:
Used by Kendall Jenner, Snoop Dogg, Khloe Kardashian, Victoria Beckham, Wiz Khalifa, BTS, Die Antwoord, Philip Bloom and featured on SNL (S41E01) and in countless TV shows and music videos!

Covered by WIRED, TechCrunch, Mashable, Forbes, Wall Street Journal, Popular Mechanics, The Independent, Macworld, TMZ and many, many others!

It's 1984, and you've got a VHS camcorder! It'll look that way when you record and send old, messed up-looking retro videos to friends. They'll swear you built a time machine: "OMG, how'd you shoot that?"

With Rarevision VHS, you'll make home movies that look and sound like real retro video tapes pulled out of storage after 30 years. You can change the on-screen date to trick your friends, create flashing cheesy custom titles, glitch up the picture by shaking your device and use the zoom lens feature to emphasize those truly embarrassing moments!

Trust us, we asked literally everyone and it's unanimous: this app is freakin' rad!

Here's Why You Need It:

• Four words: Best. Throwback. Videos. Ever.
• Create VHS-style retro videos of your kids that look like the ones from your childhood
• Impress the new girl by using our app to convince her you built a time machine
• The only VHS app you should ever consider to capture your 80s and 90s-themed parties
• Make your kids' incredibly boring school plays actually rad

And Also Because of This:

• Realism: the ORIGINAL and BEST VHS app for simulating the glitches of old videotape recordings
• Change the on-screen date so people think you're way younger--or older--than you really are
• Create custom F*L*A*S*H*I*N*G titles for the ultimate in on-screen cheese
• Phony zoom lens feature dramatically enhances the cheese factor
• Glitch the picture during recording using your finger or by shaking your device
• Don't think we forgot to make things sound retro terrible (we didn't)
• Widescreen recording option (but would you REALLY want to use it?)
• Import videos from other apps to give them the VHS treatment

*** PLEASE NOTE: THIS APP DOES NOT WORK ON ROOTED DEVICES WITH CUSTOM ROMS. If you don't know what "rooted" means, don't worry about this. ***

Follow Rarevision:
http://instagram.com/rarevision
http://twitter.com/rarevision
http://facebook.com/rarevisionfans

Rarevision is a US-based company, with all software development done in-house.

Copyright © 2015-2021 Rarevision LLC. All rights reserved.

title: Video Recorder PRO
description:
Please try HD video recorder free version before purchasing the PRO version.

HD video recorder is a free video recorder app, stable, high-quality video recorder for Android that helps you record smooth and clear videos in background mode.

Advantages:
NO root needed, NO recording time limit (but cannot record exceed 4Gb file size)
You can record video on SD card (external memory card) if your internal memory is low.

HD video recorder allows you to capture excellent video in a fast and simple way. You can even record video while your screen is a turn-off. 
HD video recorder does background recording, with or without preview, so you can use your phone as normal and recording video in parallel.
Just one touch for instant recording, schedule recording, or auto recording.

Key Features of HD video recorder:
- camera and video features
- Countdown Timer
- record video without sounds.
- One-touch to start or stop recording
- Select SDCard (external memory) or Internal memory to record
- Easy to open the folder containing recorded videos.
- Share recorded video
- Schedule recording video at a specific time
- Unlimited number of video recordings.
- Unlimited video duration.
- No camera shutter sound.
- you can record video with or without preview.
- Can record during a phone call.
- Turn the screen off and continue recording in background mode.
- Supports front and back camera.
- Easy to config duration, camera, and video ratio.
- Enable/disable notification
- Check free storage before recording.

All feedback and feature requests related to the operation of the application, as well as many other questions, can be sent to the following email of the support team: app@win-std.com.
If you like our app, please take a minute to rate it on the Google Play market.

- you can record video with or without preview.
- Can record during a phone call.
- Turn the screen off and continue recording in background mode.
- Supports front and back camera.
- Easy to config duration, camera, and video ratio.
- Enable/disable notification
- Check free storage before recording.

All feedback and feature requests related to the operation of the application, as well as many other questions, can be sent to the following email of the support team: app@win-std.com.
If you like our app, please take a minute to rate it on the Google Play market.
summary: This app is to record HD video.
comments: This app sucks and I want my money back! Says background recorder for secret recording and has a display of a camera running in the notification bar kind of defeats the purpose I would have never bought if I knew that ahead of time. But it said more features if you buy with running in the background as part of it.
Very dissapointing performance recording is only lasted for 30 min despite the option of recording was unlimited or 120 min. And the option form sms recording is not available.

Perfect for short recordings but not for lengthy duration/recordings. It stopped after reaching 60 minutes mark even though I set it up to record unlimitedly. My phone memory is still sufficient to record more, it still has 74GB. So disappointed.

Love the app. I can have my Bluetooth on playing music on my car stereo and have this app recording and it records perfectly the conversations in the car putting music in the background. Some apps say they can deliver that but they don't and you can't hear anything you record. This app delivers that quality which works out very well for me.
Very good app!! Does what you need it to do.. simple and easy to operate.

title: Posica: Posing Prompts & Poses for Photography
description:
Posica: Posing Playbook is an ad-free, award winning app full of inspirations for photographers or smartphone photo enthusiasts.
Our emotive and authentic poses are focused on making a true connection with your clients and evoking real feelings. 
 No more awkward moments or hugging & kisses! 

No matter portrait, wedding, newborn, seniors or family photoshoots - we have it all. Combined with tips & tricks for improving your photos this app is all you need to take your photography game to the next level.

Posing is  "direction" based, meaning that we prefer movement and evoking true emotions rather than static poses. 
Our posing inspirations are making it easier for models to express themselves genuinely with you. 

 📷 Key features:
✔️ 👫 plenty of pose inspirations
✔️ couple photoshoots including wedding & engagements
✔️family photoshoots

✔️ personalisation & customizing
✔️ cool ui and more coming out soon

A must have for all photographers!

title: Artemis Director's Viewfinder
description:
This version is soon to be deprecated. Please help us test the new Artemis Pro you can download it for free temporarily to test with by going to this link https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.chemicalwedding.artemis.pro



Artemis is a digital director's viewfinder designed for cinematographers, directors, and anyone interested in filmmaking, photography, cameras, and film. Artemis works in much the same way as a traditional director's viewfinder but more accurately and with many more features.

If you have any issues please email us anytime for support. We are very happy to help!
android@chemicalwedding.tv

By selecting your camera, an aspect ratio and a list of lenses, Artemis allows you to compose shots with the same field of view as the camera/lenses you will be shooting with. You can then save images, complete with focal length, GPS data, compass heading, tilt and roll, date and time, camera/lens information, and much more. A great tool for any level of filmmaker, Artemis is perfect for location scouting, storyboarding, blocking, rehearsal and preproduction.

For lenses wider than the your devices camera's field of view, Artemis adds "padding" on the screen. While this is not ideal, it's our best solution for getting around the limitations of the camera in your device.

Artemis has been field tested with every camera in our database to make sure that the field of view is correct. No other multiformat director's viewfinder has as many camera specific formats or lens sets.

Please note that field of view is measured from the "nodal point", roughly mid way down the length of the lens, in keeping with the method used by lens manufacturers. 

Camera Formats Include:

-Film-
35mm Film Standard, Super & Anamorphic
16mm Film Standard, Super & 1.3 Anamorphic
8mm Film Standard, Super, 1.36 & 1.44 
65mm Film

-35mm Digital-
ARRI Alexa, Alexa Plus, Studio, D-21
RED One, Red Epic, Scarlet
Sony F35, F3, F65, NEX-10
Panavision Genesis
Digital Stills
Canon 1D, 5DMkII & 7D, C300
Nikon D seires
Pentax series

-High Speed Digital-
Phantom HD, 7.3, 710, 9.0, 10,  Flex
Weisscam HS-1,2

-2/3" Digital-
Thompson Viper
Varicam
SI 2K
Sony F23
Sony SRW-9000

-1/2" Digital- 
Sony EX3 & EX1
-1/3" Digital-
Panasonic HVX200
Sony HDR-FX1, HDR-Z1U

*Also you can add any Custom Camera manually*

Lens Sets Included:

Generic 35mm & 16mm Lenses
Cooke Panchro
Cooke S4/i
Cooke S5/i
Panavision Primo
Panavision Primo Digital
Panavision System 65
Zeiss Master Primes
Zeiss Standard
Zeiss Super Speed
Zeiss Ultra Primes
Zeiss DigiPrimes
Zeiss SLR Lenses
Zeiss/Arriflex 65mm primes
Zeiss Compact Primes
Leica Summilux-C
Elite S series Mk1v
Hawk V-Lite 1.3x Anamorphics
Red Pro
Canon HD-EC
Canon EF Compatible
Fujinon E-Series
Generic DSLR Lenses
Bausch & Lomb Super Balter
Schneider Cine-Xenar MkII
Nikon Dx & Fx Compatible
And many others...

If your camera format or desired lens set isn't included or you believe a camera format isn't working for you, we include a custom camera feature that allows you to configure Artemis to any camera system. You can even send us the format data and we may include it in our next update.

PLEASE, DON'T BE SHY
If you have ANY problems or Artemis DOESN"T somehow perform as you expect, EMAIL US. Most issues are easily resolved, please report them to us, with as much detail as to what you were doing at the time of the issue. We really value your feedback and are always willing to accomodate our customers.

*Known Bugs*
-Some Sony Xperia devices have trouble calculating FOV of on board camera automatically. Manually enter in settings:
H - 51.2
V - 39.4
To fix issue.

*If you like the app, please rate it.*  THANKS!!

Email us anytime for support:
android@chemicalwedding.tv

Thanks,

-Chemical Wedding Team-

comments: Used to be a great app but has been dead in the water for months. The buggy state and incomplete database make it an app to avoid. Very disappointed that the developer seems to have shifted to a new more maintained Artemis Pro app while leaving previous customers in the cold.

Used to work great, but now I truly can't trust this app at all. Field of view changes when I take a photo, and the Anamorphic functionality changed, making it confusing. I'm a professional Cinematographer, so I will try the beta "pro" app, but it's a shame they left this app to die...
Again and again camera is not working properly.while am using this app it's not working properly.I request please slove it

Downloaded a few months ago before the Pro app came out Very poor app on android especially, its almost like they want us to buy the Pro version so making this poor!! Shuts down all the time now!! How is there not a option to update to the Pro version for a small charge???

Once loaded, the app shuts down every time I tried to take a picture. I lost a week's worth of work because I couldnt get it to work, and the client specifically asked for this app. It doesnt appear to work with Android phones (despite being told it does), it doesn't work to shut off phone them restart it, nor to uninstall/reinstall the app, and the apk debug they sent ro patch the problem doesnt load. So far a total waste of money.

title: Photo Gallery and Screensaver
description:
Supporting photos from your device, as well as online sources including Google Photos, Facebook, and Flickr.

Browse your photos and videos easily, offering a great way to view and share albums on your big screen. Please note that this app is optimised for the TV and will not navigate nicely on a touch device!

Showcase your photos as an Android TV Daydream/Screensaver/Slideshow.

Please note both the screensaver and gallery have an in-app purchase. The screensaver is limited to the 50 oldest photos in your library. The gallery won’t let you view photos and videos full screen. This lets you play and test the app at your leisure before purchasing if you choose to.

** Photo Sources **
- Google Photos
- Facebook
- Flickr (including your friends and family photos)
- Local photos on your device
- USB devices and SD cards
- NASA Photo a Day
- Any requests? Let us know!

** Features **
- Optionally auto include new photos and albums.
- Easily include or exclude some or all albums.

** Gallery Features* 
- Browse your albums for each photo source you choose to add.
- Browse your photos and play your videos full screen.
- Play slideshows of your albums.
- Search your library.

** Screensaver Features
- Photos load in the background for seamless playback.
- Customise the time delay between photos.
- Navigate between photos whilst daydreaming.
- Photos are chosen intelligently based on when they were taken and last viewed.
- Choose to show or hide: portrait photos, the time, information about the photo, currently playing artist and song, if available.

Since this app looks for new photos in the background, it means you only need to set it up and customise once and then you'll never need to think about it again. Just sit back and enjoy watching new and old photos alike, from your own collection as well as any chosen friends and family.

** Setting your Screensaver **
To set this app to become your default screensaver, follow these instructions by Google (https://support.google.com/androidtv/answer/6123262?hl=en-GB):

1. From Android TV’s Home screen, scroll down until you reach Settings.
2. Select Settings
3. Select Daydream/Screensaver. 
5. Select "Photo Screensaver and Gallery" from the options. 

** Set wait time for screensaver **
You can choose how long it takes for your screensaver to start when you’re not using your Android TV. Here’s how:

1. From Android TV’s Home screen, scroll down until you reach Settings.
2. Select Settings.
3. Select Daydream/Screensaver.
4. Select When to Daydream.   
5. Select "Photo Screensaver and Gallery" from the options.

** Feedback **
Please reach out to us at photos@furnaghan.com with any questions, comments, problems or requests - we'd love to hear from you!

developerAddress: Scotland.
recentChanges: * Fixing support for NVIDIA Shield 2019 models.
comments: Every time I turn my TV off and then back on again, this app has removed the wallpaper file selected to work from, and instead displays a generic wallpaper with an error message stating "Not enough photos found to display a screensaver". I then have to reselect the applicable folder to reactive the screensaver. It then works until the next time the TV is switched off and on again (isn't that supposed to FIX problems, not cause them?!). This is absolutely useless if it requires a manual search and "reactivation" every single time the TV is used. I wish there was a 0-star option.

This app is wonderful. We went from a regular Chromecast that would display our families pictures and adventures on the TV all the time to Android TV built into our new TV. Android TV did not have as good as a photo mode as CC. This app filled that gap and then-some. We love having the TV has a giant photo frame and the way this screensaver cycles through pictures is fantastic. One request - Can the screen overlay features of Gallery be implemented ot Screensaver - as well as a weather icon?

Worth the price as an alternative to the default "Daydream" app from Google. Needs two things: The ability to loop the same video during screensaver playback for the duration of the interval between slides. IE, during screensaver mode with videos enabled, a video that comes up will only play for its duration or the selected slide interval, whichever is shorter. For shorter videos, it would be nice to have the option to enable 'loop video until next slide'. More diverse codec support. MP4 is supported, but WEBM and AVI are not.

The app seems like it would do what I want, but it doesn't work on my television. I can't hook up any sources and there's absolutely no support offered by the developer. I've reached out multiple times over the course of a couple of months without so much as an autoresponse. Look elsewhere for a supported application.

You can only view 50 photos that you can't choose in screensaver mode and you have to pay 4 dollars to view your photos in fullscreen and the ability to view all of your photos. This would have been a 5 star rating but this app is like EA Games but with your photos

title: Life Lapse Stop Motion Maker
description:
Life Lapse simplifies the creation of personal time-lapse & stop motion videos. Capture change over time easily with Life Lapse OR turn your photos into looping videos. Zero editing required and NO ADS. Use the app's ghosted image feature when taking your clips to align your subject from clip to clip. To do this manually without our app, you would have to go into photo editor, create dozens of layers and align them manually, then export into video editing software. Life Lapse will save you time, money and the headache of learning some photo editor! No video editing skills? No problem! Life Lapse stiches all the clips together for you. All you have to do is select a filter, song, video ratio & you're good to go!

Document life's journey in either short video clips or photos and the app assembles those memories into a compelling and creative video bringing those memories to life. Life Lapse makes it easy for you to share your video story, whether you want a fun & different way to capture your travels, document the growth of your belly during pregnancy or showcase a product in multiple settings. Photos & individual video clips are great for sharing a single memory, what about the WHOLE journey!? Enter Life Lapse....

FEATURES:
Ghosted Image / Opacity Slider- The previous photo in the projects is overlaid in camera mode so you can align your subjects from clip to clip. No tripods needed.
Multiple Projects
Filters
Camera Timer
Re-arrange clips in a project by holding down the clip and dragging to a new spot
Delete select clips
Import photos into a project
Back Camera & Selfie Mode
Customize Sizing - Whether you want to up your story game, share on Social Networks or upload to video hosting, we have you covered with each size dimension. (9x16, 1x1, 3x4, 10x16, 4x3, 16x10, 16x9)
Re-Align an image after you take it - You can go into each photo and align it with either the first photo in the project or the previous photo, for the perfectionists out there ;)
Speed - Adjust the speed of your photo project
Music - Have you ever tried uploading a video with a popular song in it to social media? Well, unfortunately since you most likely don't own the rights to use her music, social media sites will flag the video immediately and remove it. Life Lapse has you covered with a library of 15 songs.
Tap and hold on the screen and the ghosted image will disappear.
Guideline Grid - To help you center your subjects
Reminders - Never miss a moment with reminders. Hourly, daily, weekly.
No Editing required! Life Lapse automatically assembles all your clips into a fun & unique video. No fancy editing software required. Hassle-free video creation.

Create Videos Of:
Videos for your business
Your Travels & Adventures
Stop Motion Creative Videos
Flat Lay Videos 
Baby Belly Growing
Unboxing Videos
Style Blog Videos
Stop Motion Videos
1/2, 1, 2 or 3 Second a Day Video Diary
Photo a Day of your Baby growing
Product Videos

Get inspired and join our community on Instagram at @LifeLapse_App or by searching #LifeLapse. We feature a new Life Lapse video creator each week on our Instagram story highlights, to be featured, share your Life Lapse video on Instagram & tag #LifeLapse or @LifeLapse_App for a chance to be featured.

As we strive to make Life Lapse the leading app of its kind, we really appreciate the feedback! Email us at hello@lifelapseapp.com. 

Do you like this app? Want to get your own one? Email at
LL-hello@umbrellait.com

Ghosted Image / Opacity Slider- The previous photo in the projects is overlaid in camera mode so you can align your subjects from clip to clip. No tripods needed.
Multiple Projects
Filters
Camera Timer
Re-arrange clips in a project by holding down the clip and dragging to a new spot
Delete select clips
Import photos into a project
Back Camera & Selfie Mode
Customize Sizing - Whether you want to up your story game, share on Social Networks or upload to video hosting, we have you covered with each size dimension. (9x16, 1x1, 3x4, 10x16, 4x3, 16x10, 16x9)
Re-Align an image after you take it - You can go into each photo and align it with either the first photo in the project or the previous photo, for the perfectionists out there ;)
Speed - Adjust the speed of your photo project
Music - Have you ever tried uploading a video with a popular song in it to social media? Well, unfortunately since you most likely don't own the rights to use her music, social media sites will flag the video immediately and remove it. Life Lapse has you covered with a library of 15 songs.
Tap and hold on the screen and the ghosted image will disappear.
Guideline Grid - To help you center your subjects
Reminders - Never miss a moment with reminders. Hourly, daily, weekly.
No Editing required! Life Lapse automatically assembles all your clips into a fun & unique video. No fancy editing software required. Hassle-free video creation.

Create Videos Of:
Videos for your business
Your Travels & Adventures
Stop Motion Creative Videos
Flat Lay Videos
Baby Belly Growing
Unboxing Videos
Style Blog Videos
Stop Motion Videos
1/2, 1, 2 or 3 Second a Day Video Diary
Photo a Day of your Baby growing
Product Videos

Get inspired and join our community on Instagram at @LifeLapse_App or by searching #LifeLapse. We feature a new Life Lapse video creator each week on our Instagram story highlights, to be featured, share your Life Lapse video on Instagram & tag #LifeLapse or @LifeLapse_App for a chance to be featured.

As we strive to make Life Lapse the leading app of its kind, we really appreciate the feedback! Email us at hello@lifelapseapp.com.

Do you like this app? Want to get your own one? Email at
LL-hello@umbrellait.com
summary: StopMotion Animation Camera

comments: It is a good app, but when I try to render it, it says "Something went wrong" and "Video render failed. Please try again". I'm sure I saw something in the notes for the recent update say that you fixed this bug, but you clearly haven't. Other than that, this app is great and very useful.

I love the app and I like that you can take classes to learn how to make videos/make them better, only thing is I don't like that you have to pay for a membership just to get music. Overall great job!

This app is great for animation, just that i really...really dislike that when you insert pictures and complete the animation and then save it for ypour pictures ,the quality of the video DROPS insanely

title: Photo Editor & Photo Effects - MagPic
description:
Create an amazing pics art experience with this magic photo editor & background changer - MagPic. Choose lovely pics in your photo lab, edit with super popular AI spiral, neon photo effects, emoji backgrounds, wings of angels… Besides, massive filters, fun stickers, photo collage, text, frames, blur options all are for you to make an eye-catcher. Share your stunning artworks on Instagram, Facebook, WhatsApp, Snapchat, TikTok...

Try Magic Photo Editor and get ready to be asked, if you have used magic photo editing skills :)

🔮 100+ Neon Effects 
✦ Advanced AI tools to auto apply photo effects perfectly
✦ All effects are super pop on Insta, spiral, wings, symbols, heart… 
✦ Adjust size & color, rotate effects as you like

😘 Emoji Background Changer
✦ One tap to auto change photo backgrounds with cute emoji 
✦ Auto background eraser, no messy background anymore
✦ Heart, crown, flower, butterfly, glitch, unicorn, thug life…

📸 All-in-one Photo Editor & Collage Maker
✦ 100+ Photo effects & filters to enhance pictures
✦ Tune brightness, contrast, saturation, hue, etc.
✦ Mix up to 18 pictures into a stylish photo collage
✦ 500+ Frames, backgrounds, hand-picked fonts to pick up
✦ New stickers updated every week to meet all your needs
✦ Photo on photo to maker blend effect or clip arts
✦ No crop needed, one-tap blur option to resize photos into 1:1 insta square, 9:16, 4:5, all ratios 
✦ Save photos in high resolution or share them to Facebook, WhatsApp, Line, Instagram, VK, etc.

Upcoming:
+ Sketch effects with white, colorful and NEON lines
+ Create your own emoji backgrounds

Photo Editor Pro
All types of filters for pictures and photo effects to meet all your photo editing needs, such as Sketch, Retro, Cyberpunk, Foodie, Duo tone… Adjusting brightness, contrast, warmth, shadows, sharpness and exposure to enhance pictures is also available in this professional photo editor.

Background Changer
It's also a fantastic background photo editor. Use the advanced AI cutout tool and combine your photo with a ton of creative backgrounds.

Photo Collage Maker
Create a photo collage in seconds with various layouts and frames. And you can also edit borders of collage, change background, filters and fonts as you like in this powerful photo collage maker.

About permissions:
- To create and save photos, Neon Photo Editor needs the “Storage” permission to access photos and files on your device.
- To capture beautiful photos, Neon Photo Editor needs the “Camera” permission to take pictures.

Neon Photo Editor deserves your try right away. It has more than 1000 photo effects. With Neon Photo Editor, your photo will be as brilliant as artwork. If you have any problems or suggestions, feel free to let us know. Email: collageteam.feedback@gmail.com

comments: Fun app!!!😋 Wide variety of neon art symbols, for many themes. User friendly, incl other special tools. Still learning. Soon, I'll be importing a png transparency image, to see if oversizing neon overlays will stick.

It's a great app! But we have to watch a ad to use some of them so like do have pay real money so you don't have to watch a ad? When to use the ones we can't use??
It's very cool and I love the massive selection of filters. Thank you keep up the awesome job!

So far, I've loved this app! It has great effects and lots of free options. It also allows you to watch a short video to unlock different things. I don't even remember seeing any ads besides these! Download and use to find just how great this app is! ☺️

title: A+ Gallery - Photos & Videos
description:
Loved by 9 million users, A+ Gallery is literally world’s BEST photo gallery app for your Android phone. You don’t have to make any trade-off because A+ Gallery is BETTER than any other apps in EVERY aspect.

Fast, fast, and fast
A+ Gallery is the fastest app for viewing HD photos, search photos and managing albums.

A beautiful and simple user interface
Combining the beautiful look of material design and the simplicity of iPhone style design philosophy, we made the app a great pleasure to look at and to use. Enjoy the best part from both worlds in one app.
Customise your gallery with a big collection of beautiful themes.

Automatically organise your photos
Your photos and videos are automatically organized by when and where you take them.
See your photos and videos by where you take them in the map view.

Create and manage photo albums
Organise your photos and videos by creating albums, setting your favourite albums and hiding unnecessary albums.
Perfect support for multiple SD card. Create albums in any of the external SD cards.

Search photos or videos by date, location and even image color
Your photos are now searchable by when and where you take them, and by image color.
Searching photos in A+ Gallery works without internet connection, and is lightning fast.

Hide your private photos in a password locked secure vault
Protect your privacy. Move photos and videos you want to keep secret to the secure vault. The hidden photos and videos won't be visible in the system gallery and all other apps. Only you can see the photos by entering the password.

Access all your online photos from one Gallery
If you get photos from Facebook/Dropbox/Amazon Cloud Drive, you can view and manage all those photos from A+ Gallery. Managing these photos is just as easy as managing photos in your phone.

Sync and backup photos
No matter you want to back up photos to Dropbox, or download a Facebook album to your phone, or you want a photo album and a Dropbox album to stay synchronised, A+ Gallery help you set that up in a few clicks.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/a.plus.photo.gallery/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/a_photo_gallery

comments: Easily the best gallery app I've tried, and I use it every day. However, it's missing two things that would make it a 5-star app. First, the Secure Vault cannot be put on an SD card for some reason. If I try to move the app folders to my SD card and add pictures to the Vault, it just creates a new Vault on the internal storage and ignores the SD card. Second, nested albums (including in the Vault) would be extremely convenient for organization.

I mostly like this app. But after following all the instructions, I still cannot move a selection of pics to the secure vault. I have to move each pic individually, typing in my pin every time, and even then it only copies the image, instead of moving it. Updating and uninstalling/reinstalling the app hasn't changed this. Considering moving to another app unless this can be fixed, unfortunately. Update: Thanks for the response A+, but I've already tried everything you mentioned and am still encountering the same issue. Pics can't be moved in batches to the secure folder.
The app is great but I do have just 1 problem though, when I go to crop the photo, it doesn't work, it wont be cropped after, it will still be the same? (Btw I'm on samsung)
I've tried a couple gallery apps and so far this is my favorite. Simple interface, easy to rename files. It does exactly what I need it to do, consistently.

Update: Mostly okay. 1 thing I don't like is when you move a pic to another folder, it changes the date of the pic to today. I want the true date to remain, so I know when pics were taken! This also causes pics to be sorted out of order (by the "fake" date). *Maybe have an option to sort by date taken, not just the (fake) update date. It's too easy to accidentally hit the scrollbar & then it skips down so far in the pics! If you earn coins by watching a video, you can reduce ads, which is cool!

title: LucidPix 3D Photo Creator
description:
Create, edit, and browse 3D NFT art and 3D photos that really pop! Upload and turn any image 3D, customize with art frames, special effects, filters and add your signature to the artwork. Generate a video, gif or image file that you can mint and sell on any NFT marketplace or just share it as a 3D photo on social media or messenger with your friends and family. Turn your LucidPix profile into a unique NFT canvas that takes your exceptional masterpieces up a notch.

Exhibit and experience your artwork as it moves and comes to life while scrolling without the need for special screens, glasses or a headset. Stand out from the crowd by breathing new life and depth into your art and photos using AI that injects 3D effects at a click of a button. Then share your creations with anyone through a special link that opens our browser-based 3D viewer.

Lucid’s proprietary AI technology renders your art with point clouds and depth maps within seconds, magically enhancing any piece of art or photo on all smartphones. 
📲Download LucidPix for free now 🆓 and join a community of over 1,000,000 users in creating a more beautiful and artsy NFT 3D world together!

LucidPix Features:
• Turn any art or photo into 3D masterpiece within seconds on any smartphone
• Browse a large collection of 3D artwork with more being added by our community everyday
• Decorate your mobile home/lock screen with a different live 3D wallpaper of your artwork
• Add your own 3D signature, effect, logo, text or design atop your art and photos
• Easily edit & share your 3D art and photos on Facebook, Instagram, Twitter & NFT marketplaces
• Simply download and use your personal 3D AI art assistant without special skills or tools
• Export your art as animated GIFs 🎞️ and mp4 videos or an image with a depth map 
• The App is still evolving as more features will be added every week such as
=> Convert your 3D artwork into an NFT to distribute on any platform
=> Sell, purchase and trade NFT artwork with our 1M+ community
=> Store and centralize your NFTs into a canvas just on your smartphone

comments: How does this app have such good ratings? I am going to assume most are fake. This is not what I expected, I expected a decent quality 3D pic, as the app promises. But every picture I've tried to make 3D with this app is blurry and looks ridiculous. Don't even bother downloading it. 👎
Not upto the mark, u still need to improve a lot. How can u make the image bigger than normal to make it 3D. It will show only small part. Uninstalling

I don't like the app. They stretch the image so bad that it comes out completely wrong. Most of the time it stretches the image that the hands are on the one side and the head on the other. I wouldn't recommend this app to anyone
So I dont get why it is released when the one tool that makes your photo 3D is still "coming soon." That was a disappointment. If it in fact does get released I'll re-download it
Bad it's very laggy, the app keeps freezing the pictures are getting stretched very badly
